name: Minh Boutique
address: 5 Nguyen Cao Luyen, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Đà Nẵng, cách Bãi biển Mỹ Khê 7 phút đi bộ, Minh Boutique cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có xe đạp miễn phí, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, hồ bơi ngoài trời và khu vườn. Ngoài dịch vụ tiền sảnh, chỗ nghỉ này còn có sân hiên. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ phòng và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Một số phòng có bếp với tủ lạnh, minibar và bếp. Tất cả các căn ở khách sạn được trang bị TV màn hình phẳng và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, Minh Boutique có dịch vụ thuê ô tô.

Chỗ nghỉ cách Cầu sông Hàn 1.8 km và Cầu khóa Tình yêu Đà Nẵng 2.1 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách Minh Boutique 6 km.

review.rating: The best place to stay in Da Nang!
review.comment_positive: This boutique hotel is an amazing find. Everything about it is so well thought through, the decor, attentive staff, delicious breakfast (new dishes every single day!!!), clean and spacious swimming pool... I could go on forever.
review.comment_negative: Nothing,  as everything was perfect.

review.rating: Freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal in einem sehr schönen Hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war äusserst hilfsbereit und nett. Wir konnten unsere Laundry für einen fairen Preis abgeben und der Service dafür war schnell und zufriedenstellend.
Zudem war das Zimmer sehr schön eingerichtet, mit einem wunderbaren Badezimmer und einem sehr komfortablem Bett. Ein weiteres Highlight war der Pool auf dem Dach.

review.rating: Amazing stay and an amazing staff. Feel like we’re taken care of.
review.comment_positive:
- This cute little hotel was amazing. Great locations as it’s close 5mins walk to the beach. Close to a few restaurants and shops. 

- we love the staff at Minh’s Boutique, they all greeted us whole heartily and ensure us that they will make our stay as comfortable as they can. 
I must give special thanks to Duyen, as she went out of her way to ensure me and my sister had a good night sleep as she was worried that the water pump in our room was having some repairs and thought it might affect our sleep.
She check up on us about our stay and reminded us if there anything we needed she and the staff will do the best they can. 

- The breakfast was minimal but always have a Vietnamese breakfast special which they always change daily. So you won’t be bored.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Employees are really friendly, showing their cares all the time!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Fabulous design throughout, especially the koi pond in the lobby.  Excellent breakfast and extremely helpful staff.
review.comment_negative: Many of the lobby seating (cushions) needed to be cleaned.

review.comment_positive: 베트남 분위기에 너무 잘맞았다 화려한 호텔보다는 자연에서 쉰다는 느낌이 잘 들었다

Coupure d’électricité, coupure de wifi… malgré tout ça reste un établissement agréable avec un bon rapport qualité prix

review.comment_positive: Most friendly staff! checked in around midnight but the lady was really friendly and helpful. We weren’t too happy with the room we got because it was too small so she offered us a free upgrade. Room was way more to our liking - though aircon makes quite a lot of noice (in both rooms).

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Gustownie urządzony hotel w świetnej lokalizacji. Przemiły personel, pomocny i otwarty. A śniadania ? Poezja. Chyba najlepszy hotel w  jakim bylem!!!!

review.rating: Beautiful stay in a quiet neighbood, close to the beach.
review.comment_positive: This was the best hotel we stayed at during our travel. The court with the Kois is just stunning. We loved the plants and the interior design. Also the staff is one of the nicest staff. They are really friendly and attentive and make you feel really welcome. I can just recommend staying here.

review.rating: Nice place to stay and relax in busy Da Nang
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Nice calm, green space (compared to many other buildings in the area) located close to the beach. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We would stay here again.
review.comment_negative: Be aware that the big window of the room is on the side of the inner courtyard, meaning if you want to chill in the room with some daylight everyone passing by can see you. We were out during the day so we did not mind.

review.comment_positive: Comfortable beds
review.comment_negative: Cold coffee at 9.15 for breakfast

review.comment_positive: Precioso hotel! Personal muy agradable y servicial!

review.rating: An outstanding place to stay with excellent value for money.
review.comment_positive: The staff were friendly, the rooms were clean and organised, the koi pond is absolutely stunning, as well as all the greenery. A wonderful and ideal room for couples in particular, but not limited to that by any means.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Staff was very attentive and gracious. Phoebe and Lena helped us find several excellent restaurants and were knowledgeable in many areas. Laundry service was great. Cleaning staff did a very nice job and the room was immaculate. We enjoyed breakfast in the MCM vibe of the breakfast area by the koi pond. And the location was walkable to the beach, restaurants, bakeries, coffee shops, yet quiet.
review.comment_negative: We would have liked A Reading light for each bed.

review.rating: Beautiful space, great service, amazing location
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: We liked that the hotel was within a 5-minutes walk to the beach, so it remains accessible without all the noise of the main street. Several halal restaurants nearby so that's great for Muslim travellers. The room was big and spacious, the beds comfortable. The staff at the hotel were so helpful. They reached out to us via WhatsApp the day before and maintained an open chat with us each day to check if we needed any help such as finding transport to Hoi An or Ba Na Hills.
review.comment_negative: The breakfast line-up was very small, so we skipped it most days.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
다른 호텔과 다르게 자연자연하고
다낭에 온 것 같은 기분을 느끼기위해 선택하게되었습니다
사실 나무와 식물이 많다보니 벌레가 많을까봐 걱정했어요
하지만 3박묵는동안 벌레는 한마리도 보지못했네요
무엇보다 직원분들이 너무 친절하십니다!!!
첫날 조식 먹으러 갔는데 저희에게 맞는 음식이없어서
맛만보고 컵라면에 물부어서 객실로 올라왔는데
저희가 못먹는걸 봤는지 그날 오후에 무엇이 먹고싶은지 물어봐주더라구요 볶음밥과 토스트를 말했더니 다음날 바로 해주셨어요! 조식의 종류는 많지않았지만 둘째날은 신경써주신 덕에 맛있게먹었습니다 
저녁엔 갑자기 배달음식이 먹고싶어서 그랩을 이용하려고했으나 토핑이나 선택하는 사항이 많아 도움을 요청했더니
직접주문해주시더라구요
직원분들 친절함은 10점 이상드리고싶네요
베드 청결이 살짝 아쉽긴했으나 풀장 물도 깨끗하고
호텔자체의 느낌도 전반적으로 너무좋았습니다
다낭에 또온다면 하루이틀정도는 재방문의사 있습니다🙃
review.comment_negative:
베드청결이 조금 아쉬웠어요
이불이나 커버는 괜찮았으나 베개에서 약간의 쾌쾌한향이났어요

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Perfect stay!
The staff is so nice and caring.
The hotel has a nice atmosphere, nice pool on the rooftop.
They are very helpful with renting scooters and bikes a d helping with taxis.

Room are big and clean. Lovely!

review.rating: If you’re looking for a peaceful part of a busy city,  Minh Boutique is the place to be :)
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
We loved everything about our stay here.
It was the perfect tranquil, relaxing stay we were looking for after doing the Hi Van Pass from Hue.
The bed was comfy, the food delicious, the property was exactly like the pictures. 
The staff were kind and accommodating, and easy to communicate with. 
We were given great advice for our stay and our journey onwards.
review.comment_negative: Nothing bad to note on this property.

review.comment_positive: Breakfast and service were very good.
review.comment_negative:
It’s definitely not worth the money we paid. 
This was our second hotel in Da Nang and the previous one that we paid two times less was far better. We would not pay that amount of money again. 
Old sheets and sometimes it didn’t really smell good. We would consider coming again because of the service but for far less money.

review.comment_positive: Absolutely exceptional!! It has exceed my expectation. The design and rooms looked stunning from the picture. And the truth is it’s so much more gorgeous in reality!!! And the staff were super sweet and helpful. Very cute young group of people. Always there to assist you for everything. The girl at reception Jenny I believe? Her smile just melts my heart. Would absolutely recommend to everyone!! Breakfast is amazing!! Swimming pool is so cute. Love it!
review.comment_negative: None

review.comment_positive:
I liked the staffs the most. 
Young and Helpfull, they introduced me to quang mee when I asked for food recommdation, and I would like to specially thanks for the reception letting me to make a call to the airline when my flight got cancelled. It helps !

review.comment_positive: Good hotel and away from the strip to avoid a lot of the traffic and noise. Staff are lovely and the pool is an amazing added bonus. Would recommend to anyone
review.comment_negative: The aircon switched off in the room when you leave which is not the best for the height of summer!

review.comment_positive: La tranquilidad de la estancia, el diseño y la amabilidad de sus trabajadores

review.comment_positive: Staff was extremely helpful and caring.

review.rating: Hope the hotel will improve their services in tge future
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The breakfast offered a satisfying experience. Although there weren't many options, what was available was sufficient and enjoyable.
review.comment_negative:
The room did not justify its price. On my first day, I encountered disappointment as the room was left uncleansed, with bed linens unchanged, visible grime on pillowcases, and evidence of prior occupants. Moreover, the alternative room I had booked emitted a moldy scent upon entry, with a discarded toilet roll found beneath the bed and unchanged bed linens. I had to reach out to reception around 8:30 PM to request bed replacement. Despite having ample time to thoroughly clean and inspect the rooms before guest check-in, the issue remained unaddressed.

The following day, the manager approached me to apologize and offered to upgrade my room. Additionally, she kindly provided complimentary drinks as a gesture of goodwill. Drawing from my experience of over 5 years in the hospitality industry and having stayed in various hotels, I also shared some constructive feedback with her. Despite the initial setback, I appreciated the manager's efforts to address the situation and ensure a more pleasant stay.

review.rating: A lovely experience in Da Nang !
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: This is one of the lovely properties we stayed during our recent trip and loved our stay here a lot. The Koi pond in the lobby / breakfast area is so beautiful. Room is super neat and clean. The staff goes beyond their duty to make your stay comfortable. You can rent bike / car right from the reception for a really competitive price and would definitely recommend this hotel for your stay in Da Nang. The beach is just a 2 min walk away is another benefit.
review.comment_negative: The Washrooms could have been a bit more spacious and changing room does not have a door. It's romantic for couples but with a kid, it's kind of a bothering.

review.rating: おもてなしのプロ集団　A group of hospitality professionals
review.comment_positive:
ホテルの雰囲気も、スタッフの接客も、何もかも全てが最高です。本当におススメしたいホテルです。日本人の方にも是非たくさん泊まってもらいたい。もう一泊するのでとても楽しみです。
The atmosphere of the hotel, the hospitality of the staff, everything is great. I really recommend this hotel. I would love for many Japanese people to stay here. I am staying one more night and I am very much looking forward to it.
review.comment_negative:
どうやったらこのホテルのよくない点を見つけられるのだろうか？最高のホテルです。
How can I find what is not good about this hotel? It is the best hotel.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful place with lovely design 
Comfy bed, clean room, good breakfast, nice & helpful staff
Minh is a Very beautiful hotel.. excellent helpful staff, lovely pool, very adequate breakfast, clean and very well kept and well run..
review.comment_negative:
Although this Hotel is very beautifully designed, the rooms lack in Functionality..
The bathroom is too small with nowhere to hang towels or put toiletries. there is a step up to the bed and a step down to the bathroom that can be painful in the dark.Air con blows loudly continuously.

review.rating: A pleasant base from which to explore Da Nang.
review.comment_positive: Very friendly staff. When we had an issue with our digital door lock, the reception contacted us proactively to get it fixed. Generally, all staff were very attentive.
review.comment_negative: Room air-con was very noisy.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive: Minh Boutiques is a very subtle and a very beautiful. Great rooms. Lovely team.. Felt the staff was rude at beginning but glad that I was proven wrong. They were infact very sweet. They couldn't give me an upgrade on our first night, but they promised me to give an upgrade if there was any cancellation. They stood up to it. They gave us a beautiful upgrade. So, thankyou to the team :)
review.comment_negative: I've reduced a star only because it got too loudy downstairs during the first night. If that is sorted out then they would do even better. :)

review.comment_positive: Great vibe, scenery design. Exceptional staffs.
review.comment_negative: Not enough outlets, amenities are so-so. Also little to no place for hanging stuff. Breakfast is just okay.

review.rating: I will be back as soon as I can be.
review.comment_positive: This isn’t a large glitzy 5 star chain hotel. It’s wonderfully quirky. What made my month long stay is the staff. Vi, Emma, Mun, Lan and all the rest were unfailingly kind, generous, fun and helpful. They are now friends.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Virkelig fine værelser og sød personale.

Bardzo przyjemny hotel butikowy.
Spokojna okolica. Dobre sniadanko. bardzo ładne wnętrze:)
The service was exceptional! Phoebe helped me a lot in guiding me towards my stay in Da nang through food recommendations and things to do!

スタッフの方たちがみんな丁寧、親切で、いつも気持ちの良い対応をして下さいました。
朝食も日替わりで美味しかったです。
review.comment_negative: ありません

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Our rooms were beautifully furnished. They have good amenities and looked just like the photos. For the penthouse suite, I love that we have private access to the pool at certain times. The breakfast offered were good. Staff were very friendly and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The floor of our penthouse suite was kind of dirty... I don't think they mop the floor very often. I would recommend wearing your slippers the whole time you're there to avoid dirty feet.

review.rating: Absolutely beautiful oasis in the city
review.comment_positive: One of of the loveliest hotels I have ever stayed in. Everything about this place is wonderful - it is so calm and serene, with a beautiful koi fish pond in the centre. The staff are incredibly friendly and helpful, the rooms are super comfortable, the breakfast is delicious, and the roof-top pool is heavenly. We extended our stay because we loved it so much!
review.comment_negative: We liked everything about this place - it's perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Staff were super nice and helpful, all of them! And when they knew I was going to bus station alone, they were very concerned about my safety and helped me to contact taxi driver. I really enjoyed staying there, room also very clean and beautiful. Love from China ❤️
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Gorgeous boutique hotel, different from a typical high rise hotel
review.comment_positive: It was beautiful, lovely clean room and comfortable bed and pillows. The staff were friendly and helpful. The rooftop pool was gorgeous - this property looks exactly like the pictures.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was perhaps a little lacking but that is all I could think of.

review.comment_positive: We had a lovely stay, the team was very helpful when we had a request.

review.rating: Meilleur rapport qualité / prix sur Da Nang
review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est magnifique, c'est un havre de paix dans Da Nang. les chambres sont spacieuses. La piscine sur le toit est très relaxante. L'hôtel est bien situé à proximité de la plage. La serviabilité du personnel. Excellent rapport qualité/ prix.
review.comment_negative:
Le lit d'appoint (certes gratuit) qui était vraiment inconfortable.

review.comment_positive: インテリアが非常にユニークでここを選んだ。実際に宿泊して見て、さらに気に入った。ビーチまで歩いて5分ほどで非常に静かで落ち着いたところにあった。ホテル内も静かでのんびりとした時間を過ごすことができた。
review.comment_negative: 非常に満足しているが、強いて言うなら、朝食のバリエーションがもう少しあるとよかった。また、非常に細かいが、洗面台にゴミ箱があるとなお良い、もう少し大きめのティーカップがあるとなお良い、タオルフックが2つ以上あるとなおいい、ベッド付近にコンセントがあるとなお良い。

review.rating: Very nice boutique hotel with super friendly staff!
review.comment_positive:
Very clean apartment, not far from the beach. The personell was utmost friendly and supportive. With a Grab Taxi you are very fast in the center. 
Special thanks to Phoebe, who was very caring and helped us in every possible way. The breakfast was okay. The apartment (penthouse) on the top floor is a bit bigger with a few extras. We liked the exclusive usage of the rooftop swimming pool after 8 p.m..

review.rating: Very friendly and comfy hotel. The staff are lovely. Young was incredibly helpful.
one of the best hotels we’ve ever visited
review.comment_positive: theme of our stay was: nature and the city, everything was excellent especially the staff was very friendly and attentive
真是超出预期！无处不在的设计，环境、声音、味道一切都是那么完美，床也超舒服，此次行程中最满意的一家酒店。phoebe服务周到，非常的专业。下次如果有机会来岘港，肯定还会选择来这里。

review.rating: Chic hotel, gorgeous gardens, excellent service
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Really chic, personal feeling property. Beautiful terraced gardens and a koi pond visible from each floor. Excellent service, great breakfast, and attentive staff. Glad I chose this place over one of the large tower hotels, made my trip to Da Nang very special!
Mọi thứ đều ở mức cơ bản, hoạt động ổn, không có gì để phàn nàn.
beautiful hotel with lovely staff
快適、朝食も美味しかった
review.comment_negative: 特に無し

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
A wonderful hotel, away from these large hotel complexes on the beach. The location is great, you can be on the beach in about 10 minutes. The restaurants on the beach offer the finest seafood. 
The rooms are super cozy and very clean - the room service was great at all times. The entire staff always greeted us with a warm smile and Phoebe was always very attentive. We really enjoyed our time in this oasis - Cảm ơn rất nhiều!

Herzliches und zuvorkommendes Personal, super Lage, ein Bijou, sehr empfehlenswert♥️
Viele Leistungen können über das Hotel gebucht werden: Tickets für Ba Na Hills, 
Motorcycle, Shuttle, Laundry, etc.
Sehr gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis.

Will be back and stay here longer.

my view faces another rooms view to the garden

review.comment_positive: Mới bước vào mà bị ngợp bởi sự tách biệt hoàn toàn với bên ngoài. Mình mê đắm cái hồ cá koi thật sự, lúc nào cũng phải ngồi lại nhìn ngắm một lúc rồi mới đi. Nhà trống khá nhiều cây nên tạo được cảm giác mát mẻ. Lối kiến trúc cũng khá độc lạ so với mấy ks trước đây mình từng ở.  Hồ hơi cực chill trên sân thượng, sống ảo thoả thích. Các bạn nhân viên cũng rất vui vẻ nhiệt tình, nhất là cô bếp. Mong Đà Nẵng mau hết dịch để mình được quay lại 😍
review.comment_negative: Wifi hơi chậm

review.rating: While our stay staff Lena helped us a lot, kind and friendly. The hotel is adorable with its special exotic vibe.
Excellent experience, best hotel we’ve stayed on our trip.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Love the unique interior design! The greenery keeps the heat away allowed us to enjoy hanging out in the common area. Bed and pillow were very comfortable, AC works well in all rooms. Hotel is tucked away in a quiet location but walkable distant from the beach, markets and restaurants. The highlight for us is the staff and their attentiveness and kind. We love Minh Boutique, definitely our first choice next time we’re in Da Nang.

review.rating: Beautiful calming hotel with exceptional service
review.comment_positive: very well designed hotel, there is a beautiful atrium in the lobby area that looks exactly like the photo where you can relax and order food/drinks. the rooms are very spacious and clean. the staff were exceptionally accommodating, making sure our room was very cool before we settled in. Phi Long and Vi had a lot of local knowledge to share and went above and beyond for us! thank you, we’ll definitely be back

review.rating: Super cute, wish I stayed longer
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: This hotel is very well located, allowing us to explore Da Nang and realise what a gem of a city it truly is! This property is so cute, the open-air design makes it feel much larger, and the Koi pond is seriously impressive. Our queen room had a very cool bathroom with separate facilities that made it feel much more private. Absolutely adorable hotel, wish we could have stayed much longer. The staff are super nice and helpful with excellent English skills, they even gave me recommendations for food and shops in our next city !
review.comment_negative: From memory there's no power outlet close to the bed - good for reducing screen time lol

review.comment_positive: Super tolles Personal, prima Lage.
review.comment_negative: Die Klimaanlage war sehr laut und nicht modern. Beim Frühstück hätte ich mir wärmere Dpeisen gewünscht, zum Teil schon kalt,

review.comment_negative: The room was beautiful and clean but there was some outside (buzzing) noise. We slept with earplugs.

review.rating: Wonderful stay, mostly due to staff excellent customer service!

review.comment_positive: Excellent and friendly staff with a good breakfast,Very good location and had a wonderful stay. Hotel organised mopeds for us from the shop next door at a very fair daily price.

review.comment_positive: Såå fint hotell – litet, charmigt och mysigt med fina vrår överallt. Bästa hotellfrukosten jag varit med om och personalen och servicen var otrolig!

review.rating: pleasant enough but needs some tweaking
review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: clean and friendly
review.comment_negative:
-tv problem no one helped. 
-lighting in bathroom shocking. 
-air-conditioning not successful needed a extra fan in the bed area and the fan above the dining room on high speed. all going on when we arrived and stayed that way all our visit.  
-bathroom had open window that couldn’t close.  the gaps in the door allowed the heat in and cool air to escape.  
-breakfast was atrocious  
- we asked a guy to make reservation at moc for dinner and told us didn’t need to book.  when we got there we where told you have to book and we needed to wait 45 min before we could get a table.

review.rating: Beautiful serene stay close to the beach
review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: From the moment you arrive there is amazing service - they greet you with delicious tea and cookies as they check you in. The room on the top floor was luxurious and for such a great cost. We feel very relaxed.
review.comment_negative: There could have been more food provided for breakfast. The cleaning people made our bed, but didn't change the sheets.

review.comment_positive:
Die Lage des Hotels war sehr super. Zum Strand waren es nur 600 m.
Ein Highlight war der hauseigene Pool auf dem Dach. Er war sehr sauber und man hatte einen super Blick über die Stadt und zum Meer. Am Pool gab es auch ein Klo und ein Dusche. Wir durften den Abreistag noch am Pool verbringen und haben dafür frische Handtücher bekommen. 
Die Zimmer waren sehr sauber und wurden sogar jeden Tag Nass rausgewischt.
review.comment_negative:
Das Zimmer war ohne Licht sehr Dunkel, da kaum Sonnenlicht eingetreten ist. 
Es gab am Pool nur wenige Liegeflächen. Diese waren auch sehr unbequem, da es keine Polster gab.
Der Waschservice ist sehr günstig, allerdings waren manche Kleidungsstücke nicht ordentlich gewaschen.

review.rating: Warm and welcoming stay close to everything. Will definitely recommend!!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
We stayed here for 5 nights and it was great. The location is 3 mins walk to the beach and there are food places all around.
The staff working there will treat you so well that towards the end of our holiday my wife and I felt like we were living at our own house. We got so comfortable there. 
Everything you need will be taken care of.
review.comment_negative:
The aircon in there rooms are not that cold considering the weather outside
The breakfast could have been slightly better. It was not a big spread.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Very lovely staff and a beautiful aesthetic
review.comment_negative: We didn’t receive the room we booked, and it is a little loud with the construction next door

review.comment_positive:
Wir waren mit allem sehr glücklich. Das Zimmer war super schön eingerichtet, wir haben uns direkt sehr wohl gefühlt. Das Frühstücksbuffet hatte eine gute Auswahl, es war für jeden was dabei. Am besten hat uns das sehr nette und zuvorkommende Personal gefallen. Insbesondere Young war immer für uns da und hat sich liebevoll um uns gekümmert. Sie hatte uns bereits vor unserer Ankunft per WhatsApp herzlich empfangen. Sie hat uns gute Tipps für Sehenswürdigkeiten und Essen gegeben und war dabei gleichzeitig nie aufdringlich. Es war als würden wir mit einer Freundin sprechen, bei der man völlig frei fragen kann ohne bedenken zu haben, dass man dann irgendetwas buchen müsste. Gleichzeitig hat sie angeboten sich um die Buchung oder Reservierung zu kümmern, falls wir das möchten. Also alles in allem der beste Service, den man sich wünschen kann!
Vielen vielen Dank dafür 🙏
good staff.
Undefinierbaren Lärm kriegt man leider nicht weg mit einem extra Getränk.
review.comment_negative:
Nach einem langen Tag spät nach 23 h eingecheckt. 
Dann ein lästiges Geräusch von einer Pumpe oder so ähnlich. Völlig unregelmässig. 
Richtig nervig. 
Passt nicht zu den guten Bewertungen

review.rating: Excellent position, nice and quiet. Lovely breakfast and good size rooms
review.comment_positive: Relaxing feeling at this hotel, staff friendly, happy to help and offer suggestions of trips, restaurants and places to see
review.comment_negative: Not so much not like but bedside tables and more storage places would be nice

review.comment_positive: Schönes minimalistisches Design und tolle Lage. Sehr freundliches und zuvorkommendes Hotelpersonal
review.comment_negative: Singvögel werden in der Lobby in viel zu kleinen Käfigen gehalten - für ein Hotel heutzutage ein absolutes No Go! Hätten wir das vorher gewusst hätten wir dieses Hotel nicht gebucht! Dazu können wir uns den Vorrednern anschließen das Hotel ist sehr hellhörig man kann die Nachbarn reden hören.

review.comment_positive:
Khách sạn thiết kế rất đẹp, không gian xanh mát.
Bữa sáng ổn. Nhân viên thân thiện.

review.comment_negative: 排水が少し悪かったです。

review.comment_positive: Excellent location, short walk to beach and restaurants.  Staff at the Hotel were extremely helpful and friendly, and spoke very good English.  Nothing was too much trouble, from arranging vehicles, and collecting food from a nearby restaurant for us.  Breakfast at the Hotel was great.

review.rating: Highly recommend this hotel. I definitely would like to come back next time. 👍
review.comment_positive: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Very well designed hotel. I loved the tress and wooden designs in this hotel. Calm music and warm service. The bed and pillow were comfy. Breakfast was simply but really tasty.
review.comment_negative: The pick up service wasn’t very clear. I spent about 30mins to wait the pickup driver. ;( The area isn’t that clean to walk around. But you can see Vietnamese real house area.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The style and design of the hotel was nice, welcome and farewell drink also were a nice touch. The staff helped with laundry and scooter rental
review.comment_negative:
I’d suggest for the staff to give a bit of an introduction of da nang, a map and suggestions of where to eat and places to see. We were out all day exploring the areas outside but some suggestions coming from the staff would have been helpful.
Finally, for  breakfast the coffe didn’t seem that good compared with other places we stayed

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.rating: Excellent stay, I would come here over and over again!
review.comment_positive:
- excellent service
- relaxing area by the pond
- room had excellent air conditioning
- breakfast is delicious!
review.comment_negative:
- some noise by window, bring ear plugs
- steps in the room made of hard to walk at night without tripping
- toilet is very close to the door making it hard to use

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Is a cosy place that is near the beach and city. Quite close to many seafood restaurants. Staff here is warm and helpful 👍
review.comment_negative: The cups provided in the room is small, hard to drink hot drink without handle. The plates, cups, glasses and cutlery for breakfast is under the buffet table, need to bend to take, not so convenient.

review.rating: Great stop on the way south.
review.comment_positive: The young man, name of long?, was the most exceptional host; for example, when asked where the nearest ATM was, 'Twas way too far for two grey heads, but he offered to take the dame on his motorbike! The entire staff were anxious to accommodate us in all aspects-  ambassadorship was 5 star.
review.comment_negative: Our health, after suffering  the results of Hanoi's pollution.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The room was spacious and very clean. Awesome service by friendly staff. Breakfast had a lot of variety.
Very agile and helpfull staff at the hotel.

review.rating: Lovely, calming hotel. Can highly recommend.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Absolutely gorgeous hotel. The staff are very friendly and couldn’t do more to help you. There is such a wonderfully calm feeling throughout, from the fish pond on the ground floor, the hanging plants on every floor above and finally the swimming pool on the top floor. It is located within easy walking distance to the beach and restaurants but without being bothered by noise from bars. I would definitely stay here again.
review.comment_negative: You will have to close the curtains on the front glass windows of your room when you’re inside to retain privacy.

review.comment_positive: Kiến trúc đẹp, không gian thoáng và sạch sẽ. Nhân viên rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo. Khu vực dưới sảnh có quầy cf nhỏ khá xinh và tiện lợi. Đến đây 1 lần là có hình up cả năm :)))
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.rating: The girls Vi and Phoebe were beyond helpful and genuinely friendly. We visited for my mums 70th and they went out of the
review.comment_positive: Such a beautiful peaceful space.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: El personal, todas las chicas de recepción súper amables y serviciales preocupándose siempre por nuestro bienestar. El hotel con una decoración súper bonita y la habitación también, con una cama muy cómoda y buenas almohadas. La piscina en la planta de arriba y el desayuno bastante variado. Cogimos el servicio de lavandería y alquilamos la moto allí también. Volvería a quedarme sin duda alguna.
review.comment_negative: Por decir algo sería que en la habitación no tiene colgadores y no hay dónde colgar las toallas.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The Minh Boutique Hotel was an absolute gem! From the moment we stepped foot inside, we were blown away by the stunning decor and attention to detail. The staff were incredibly attentive, always ready to assist with a smile. Our room was cozy and the bed was like sleeping on a cloud. Even though our stay was short, it was memorable.
review.comment_negative: The size of the bathroom sink was small, which made it challenging to use without causing water spillage.

review.comment_positive: Great value for money, nice location (walking distance to the beach) and very attentive staff.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast could have more variety, but overall great value for money

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The property was very calm and relaxing for my partner and I. We had a very nice stay and we were helped by Mon and she was amazing! She helped with our needs and services and was a very great host!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Gorgeous interior and architectural design. Short walk to the beach. Lovely room, and nice having music playing. Staff were really helpful with their tips about getting to Ba Na Hills. The driver we organised through the hotel to Ba Na Hills was really kind too.

review.rating: Great experience, very relaxing and the staff are so helpful
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive: Everything
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: We had a great experience at the Minh boutiques hotel.. extremely helpful and diligent staff with Phoebe and Lena guiding us for day trips to hoi an and ba na hills  ....rooms and ambience of the hotel are really aesthetic and serene...they also helped us with a room upgrade and an early breakfast..overall a great stay given all the positives including the location 🙂

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: One of my favourite stays in Vietnam! I loved the room layout. Dual access to bathroom, TWO chairs by window which most hotels lack, this was a great addition! I loved the music that played and I loved having Evie on WhatsApp for whatever is needed - so amazing! It was these extras that stood out from other stays. Bed was really comfy, service exceeded expectation and location was good also. Really loved it here
review.comment_negative:
That we didn’t stay longer! We truly were not ready to leave and wished we had booked an extra day.

review.comment_positive: Love the overall aesthetic especially the koi pond.  The staff is unfailingly nice and helpful. In particular, Phoebe and her male colleague during the day shift went out of their way to make our stay enjoyable, including recommending a local restaurant that was great.

review.comment_positive: 我们在这里住了三晚，住的很开心，房间干净，早餐丰富，这里的工作人员也很友善，他们给我们推荐了附近的餐厅，我们连续吃了两天，非常棒的推荐！这个酒店有一项服务很贴心，他们会根据你的国籍推荐和你对接的工作人员，以便给你更好的帮助。和我们对接的是Phoebe，她会讲中文！我们中间遇到了一点问题，她很快想办法帮我们解决了，很感谢她！我对这里的印象很好！

review.comment_positive:
Das Personal war sehr bemüht und freundlich, wir haben sogar Pancakes als Lunch für einen Tagesausflug zum Mitnehmen bekommen. Das Frühstück war gut und abwechslungsreich, wir wurden auch gefragt, was für Vorlieben wir haben. 
Das Hotel bietet 2 Fahrräder zur kostenlosen Nutzung an, welche von uns in regem Gebrauch waren.
Die Betten waren sehr bequem und das Zimmer an sich wirklich sauber. Positiv anzumerken ist auch das Klopapier, das im Vergleich zu anderen Unterkünften dicker war 😄
Das Zimmer, das uns zuerst zugeteilt wurde, hatte einen Wasserschaden, wir haben jedoch direkt am nächsten Morgen ein neues Zimmer bekommen.
Alles in allem ein sehr angenehmer Aufenthalt!

Very nice and spacious room, and the rooftop pool is nice, although we could have used more sunbeds. The Breakfast is great, and the beds are comfortable. The room is very clean and the shower is great.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Best hotel in DaNang ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Facilities -
Welcomed with open arms, a lovely tea and snacks on arrival.
Beautiful hotel facilities with gorgeous koi pond, lovely restaurant area overlooking the gorgeous koi pond. Perfect for relaxation. The pool area is on the top floor with views! 
The breakfast had many options which changed throughout our stay it was my first time to try local speciality Cao Lau which was so tasty. Also very accommodating to my vegan/vegetarian friend.
-Rooms were clean, spacious and well appointed with room for suitcase, comfortable beds.
Location -
A quiet spot close to everything!
- Only a short cab ride from the airport.
- In a great spot with lovely restaurants near by such as Non La for some great local Vietnamese cuisine.
- A short walk to the beach and a safe swimming area. Plus many bars and beach Front restaurants to choose from.
- Close to the son Tra Night Market and famous Dragon Bridge.

Staff -
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
Most helpful and attentive staff at a hotel ever. Ms Evie certainly made our stay was ever so warm, friendly and helpful. Helped us to suggest dinner options, to help with local travel also. Very much appreciated her amazing level of service and she is an asset to the hotel! Thanks again Ms Evie!

If you plan to stay in DaNang please choose Minh Boutique hotel!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
スタッフがフレンドリーで、とても親切でした。オプショナルツアーの相談や、近所の美味しいレストランの紹介など親身になって相談に乗ってくれて助かりました。
部屋や共用の設備は、東南アジアンスタイルの装飾で落ち着けます。屋上に温水プールがあり、プールの周囲には白いブルメリアの木が植えられていてアジアのリゾート気分を味わえます。滞在中は、ビーチからホテルに帰って来て、そのまま潮にまみれた身体ごとプールに入って潮を落とすということを日課にしていました。
朝食は、メインを2～3種類のメニューから1つ選び、後はブッフェスタイルで好きなものを選ぶ形式です。メインには定番のフォーや、洋風のオムレツ等がありました。どれも美味しかったです。
洗濯は、Kg単位で受けてくれます。ソックスやパンツ等の下着類からTシャツ、短パン等をまとめて洗濯に出せます。受付も時間が決まっている訳ではなく、いつでも自分たちの都合の良い時間に洗濯物を出せて、7時間後に受け取れました。このサービスもとても助かりました。
review.comment_negative: 目立ったものはありませんが、洗面台が狭かったです。あと、バスローブはあるものの、柔道着の上くらいの丈しかありませんでした。もう少し丈の長いバスローブだと良かったです。

review.comment_positive: Great ambiance, friendly staff.
review.comment_negative:
Soundproofing can be better. There’s a karaoke behind my room and I could hear people singing every night. In addition, I could hear the water pipe draining water from the room directly above me. 

The design of the room is not ideal. There’s no power socket anywhere near the bed, so to charge your phone, you need to put it 2 meters away. There’s also no light switch within reach near the bed, so if you want to switch off lights when going to bed, you’ll have to get up, switch all the lights off, then feel your way back to bed in darkness. Not sure if the person who designed the room actually spent a night inside.

review.comment_positive:
the architecture and interior design
calm music playing and the option to turn it off
review.comment_negative: elevator was nice but a bit slow

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
It was a wonderful stay.
The hotel itself is in a good location, just 5-7 minutes to the beach, 5 minutes to the night market by taxi.
The hotel itself is very beautiful, plants everywhere, a pool for fish on the first floor. The room is spacious, cozy, the bed is comfortable. The service was second to none from the start. They welcomed us, told us everything, took us to the rooms. All the staff were very very nice. Breakfast - delicious, varied, you can get freshly fried eggs and pho soup every morning. The coffee was the tastiest I had tasted in Vietnam. The hotel staff even gave it to us as a gift, so we can taste it in Lithuania as well. So we highly recommend this hotel.
Thang máy khá rộng rãi, nhóm chúng tôi di chuyển cùng lúc rất thoải mái.

This hotel is very nice and modern, i really like the architecture. It is also very clean, and breakfast is really good. 
Staff also very helpful
review.comment_negative: There were only 2 bicycles for rent, could add more.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: We really liked the atmosphere, the staff was also very helpful and polite. The location is central and it was easy to get around.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Trevligt litet hotell kändes som att bo i en liten stuga. Skön säng och bra läge.
review.comment_negative: Inga sängbord, dåligt med elkontakten.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The property was in a great location to access the beach and the local restaurants. The common areas were gorgeous and had a great atmosphere. I loved the controllable music in the room, it was nice to put on in the morning to wake up. The staff were really friendly and couldn’t do enough for us, we made use of the laundry service and our clothes came back smelling amazing and folded. We will definitely stay here again. We would like to give a particular mention to Mun and phoebe who are our stay very enjoyable, they brought us complimentary iced drinks each time we entered the hotel after being out in the warm weather.
review.comment_negative: Nothing.

review.comment_positive: A really stunning hotel, enjoyed my stay there immensely. Very peaceful and serene. Breakfast was fantastic, especially enjoyed the different menu they have everyday. Beach is about 10 mins walk away, and there are also many food options around. 10/10 recommended!
review.comment_negative: Sink area was a little bit too small and crowded for me.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_negative: Not everyone speaks or understands English

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

review.rating: また絶対に泊まりたいホテル
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: ホテルのスタッフの方の気遣い、サービスが素晴らしいです。何を聞いても丁寧に教えてくれます。部屋は非常に清掃が行き届いており、ホテル内の雰囲気も最高でした。ホテルには、ドリンクを注文出来るカウンターがあり、そこでは300円ほどで美味しいスムージーやコーヒーを飲むことが出来ます。一日中ホテルで過ごしたいと思う程、素敵なホテルでした。
review.comment_negative: なし

review.comment_positive: We had an incredible stay at Minh Boutique! The staff's warmth made us feel right at home. Being vegan, they exceeded our expectations with a variety of delicious options. Even with rainy weather, their guidance ensured we had a delightful stay. The spa recommendations were truly an unforgettable experience, adding the perfect touch to our relaxing getaway. The staff really went out of their way to help us have a wonderful stay at Da Nang.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

reviewer.country: United Arab Emirates (Các Tiểu Vương Quốc Ả Rập Thống Nhất)

review.comment_positive:
This place is lovely for sure but I don’t feel it’s amazing and deserves the very high ratings it gets. 
The service is good. Before we even arrived we were contacted by WhatsApp and given a rep to communicate with via our stay. This was actually really helpful and appreciated.
Whilst there, the staff were very kind and accommodating, already checking in and making sure everything was ok.
The hotel foyer was lovely and the fish was really a nice touch. 
There was music piped through the hotel and you could turn it on and off in your room. Really nice.
 Breakfast was fine. Had a good variety but not amazing.
review.comment_negative:
The pool was tiny and weird in design and there was no pool towels. We had to take the room towels and when requested more pool towels it took over an hour.
The hotel isn’t in the best area. There are restaurants around but all are mainly seafood and cater for Koreans.

review.comment_positive: Had a great stay at Minh Boutique. The rooms were clean and nice, the atmosphere of the hotel was good, and the staff was super helpful!

Good value for money and nice little boutique hotel. The rooftop pool was great - always quiet. Good location- managed to walk to most places, or a short grab ride. Short walk to the beach and good restaurants and cafes. Staff were very friendly.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast was OK- could do with a few more options (good thing is plenty of nice cafes nearby with great coffee and cheap food options).  Air-conditioning was a little noisy as the unit is partially exposed in roof.

review.comment_positive: Great experience. Service very friendly. Perfect location. And a very nice pool. Thank you. Recommend.

review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Lena and the team at Minh Boutique were incredibly welcoming and provided lots of recommendations on what do and where to eat within the area. They were incredibly helpful in organising Airport transfers and drivers to different locations. All the drivers were also truly wonderful. I highly recommend Minh Boutique for the staff, location, room and breakfast.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: the staffs were sweethearts! super accommodating. the hotel itself was super cute. the greenery and layout was super aesthetic. we rented their motorbike for 150k a day and was able to see a lot of đà nẵng with it. location of the hotel was very nice, super close to beach and lively streets. i forgot my bikini after i checked out and one of the staff members shipped it to me to a whole other city. i cant recommend this place enough! will be back soon :)
review.comment_negative: no nightstand

review.comment_positive: From start to finish all staff were kind and attentive making you feel well cared for. Room was beautifully laid out and had a wonderful view into the central garden and pond. The pool on the top floor provided pleasant restbite from the hot muggy weather on a few occasions. As well as having a lovely view overlooking Da Nang. We even sat under the shaded area on the roof during a storm to watch the Thunder and lightning. We extended our stay by 2 days because of how comfortable and relaxing the hotel was. Would recommend.
review.comment_negative: Only picking at small issues here, the free bike to rent all had flat tyres when we went to use them, which was a small inconvenience as the rental mopeds were all being used that day as well. Still a 10/10 stay though.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.rating: Great service, clean space, convenient location and delicious breakfast!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The location is great, lots of restaurants around and very close to the beach. The breakfast had a good range and everything was so delicious! They will also help arrange private car with driver and tours for you – all very affordable. We had a driver called Thanh and he was brilliant. The hotel will also contact you via WhatsApp ahead of check-in and also during your stay to make sure everything is ok! I had Lena (receptionist) contact me and she has been very helpful. Highly recommend staying here!

Die Lage ist fußläufig zum Strand, das Hotel bietet für weitere Aktivitäten einen Roller Verleih.

Tot de fusta, un fil musical molt confortable, i un tracte excepcional  per part dels empleats. L’habitació no defrauda, llit molt comode, bany super net i de qualitat. Piscina superior espectacular! El menjar molt bo!

review.comment_positive: Relaxing lounge area with cool koi pond and greenery. Great to relax and read after long day trips in the sun. Staff was very lovely and helpful with check-in + check-out. Didn't get in the pool but looked very fancy with a nice view. Breakfast was great, as always.

Loved the location, the style of the hotel and the staff. Vikki and the staff were so helpful. They were very responsive at any time and helped to schedule many things for us. Liked bfast and hotel was close to the beach. I would stay there again - but next time more nights.

review.comment_positive:
We found the vibes of this hotel the most calming. We loved the koi fishes around the lobby.

The staff was very accomodating, friendly and proficient in English. They had good restaurant recommendations and where to explore in Da Nang. Shout out to Vicky for her great customer service.

The room was kept mostly clean, though a little small.
review.comment_negative: Though the room had AC, we found the cooling very weak. We had to request a fan to sleep the night. The staff was very accommodating, and made up for it the next day by giving us a free ride to the airport.

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Nothing sadly, helpful staff, the unacceptable state of this hotel not their fault, the owner really needs to address the situation!
review.comment_negative: I’m not sure where to start…two night stay in top apartment…no safe in room or safe at reception, in my many years of travelling I’ve never come across this, we had to take all our valuables passports etc out with us daily as the doors did not lock properly, very tired and  filthy room, the bed curtains were disgusting, mattress very old, there is a large broken glass panel on the rooftop of which someone is going to have a terrible accident with at some point, breakfast not acceptable, the bathroom smelt dreadful and lots of items broken including shower head hanging off the wall and door handle broken, the tv did not work, there was mention of a refund of which we said to be fair 50% would be acceptable but the manager/owner only came back with a 30% of one night stay of which we gave to the lady on reception for being so apologetic, I’m not quite sure why this hotel had such good reviews but I feel I need to let other potential guest know the true situation with this hotel, that’s what a review is for, a true and honest reflection of your experience!

review.rating: wenn ihr in Da nang seid, Ist dieses Hotel ein Muss !
review.comment_positive:
einer der schönsten Hotels die wir in Vietnam hatten. 
das Hotel wirkt wie eine Oase durch die großen Fenster, den schönen Innenhof! Frühstück war super gut, es gab jeden Tag was anderes und wir es wurde auf unsere Wünsche jederzeit eingegangen !  großes shout out an das Personal was außergewöhnlich gut war! ihr macht ein tollen Job !
review.comment_negative: es war alles top!

review.comment_positive:
綠意盎然，感覺不在在都市中，旅館讓你除了享受海灘還能處在森林中。
Surrounded by lush greenery, it feels like you're not in the city at all. The hotel allows you to enjoy the beach while being in the midst of a forest.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: the location is great and the design was lovely and peaceful.  the staff was overly helpful and always positive. the bed was so comfortable!
review.comment_negative: even thought the design was estheticaly nice there was no practicality.. for example, there were no outlets to charge your phone near the bed.

review.rating: Nice hotel, not very well thought out
review.comment_positive: The architecture is nice and so is the rooftop pool.  The rooms are cozy. Nice courtyard.
review.comment_negative: The room decor has a few flaws.  No bedside tables, no sockets and light switches by the beds.  The bathroom has very little counter space for two guests and no hooks for bath towels and clothes. A safe would be great.

review.comment_positive:
こじんまりした、ベトナム文化が香る美しいホテルでした。屋上の美しいプール、部屋や設備、サービスは清潔で掃除が行き届いており安心して使えます。スタッフはとても親切です。レストラン、レセプションのスタッフは常に宿泊者を気にかけ、毎日の予定を聞いて、地元のおすすめの店や観光情報を紹介してくれます。レセプションとはLINEで繋がる提案をされるのですが、テキストベースでやりとりができるのは、英語が堪能でない私にはとてもありがたかった。
体調を崩して相談した時、予約内容の間違いが発覚した時、大変親身になって解決してくださいました。ダナンで安心して泊まれるホテルとしておすすめします！
近所にスーパーやレストラン、マッサージがありますし、grabが安いのでどこに出かけるにも便利やな場所です。
review.comment_negative: 特になし

review.comment_positive: Amazing! Would recommend it! Best accommodation in Da Nang. Phenomenal!!

review.rating: Clean, peaceful and comfortable accommodation at a fair price.
review.comment_positive: One of the nicest accommodations we had the pleasure of staying in whilst travelling S.E Asia the rooms are tidy and comfortable, very much up to western standards. This accommodation is tranquil, clean and relaxing. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

review.comment_positive: Wunderschöne Moderne Unterkunft mit Zentraler Lage. Sehr freundliche Mitarbeiter und ein super Service runden den Aufenthalt ab. Wir kommen gerne wieder.

review.comment_positive: Nice staff
review.comment_negative: After reading all the nice reviews and seeing the good rating, we were really excited to come to this hotel. Unfortunately it was one big disappointment. Extremely noisy, you can hear people moving furniture above you, kids screaming in corridors and lobby, karaoke music at night. The room design is beautiful but impractical, windows are facing opposite rooms so basically everyone can see inside, we had our curtains closed almost all the time to get some privacy and felt like in a cave. There are no plugs or nightstands next to the bed, no place to hang towels or swimsuits. Also one of the worst breakfasts we had, poor choice, lack of fresh fruit. We basically ate PBJ toast and bland fried eggs for 4 days. Definitely not worth the money we spent.

review.rating: great location, wonderful staff and nice breakfast cooked to order.
review.comment_positive: Great location. Close to a fabulous beach and so many great restaurants nearby. very welcoming and very helpful staff. especially Mun the manager of the hotel. helped me with an issue I had with the Grab app. spent so much time explaining things to me, as well as suggesting tours, and giving us directions

review.comment_positive: Удачно расположен, тихое место рядом с центром, красивый дизайн, очень приятный персонал , готовый помочь в любую минуту.
review.comment_negative:
Отель чуть-чуть подустал, треснутые дверцы шкафчика, отколотые жалюзи, царапины и пятна кое-где. Номер явно тракт небольшого косметического ремонта. Думаю что хозяину стоило бы исправить эти маленькие косяки, чтобы они не портили впечатление от отеля. И еще халаты в номере такие маленькие как будто на ребенка. Я еле влезла, а муж мой его бы и не натянул бы. 
И , конечно, отсутствие розеток и тумбочек у кровати, хорошо что мы удлинитель с собой взяли, иначе заряжать бы пришлось в ванной или на другом конце комнаты
The toilet noise flushing at night and through out the day. Regardless, the receptionist was honest and made us aware of it as it was a known issue of the room they’re planning to rectify.

review.comment_positive: The staff was incredible, always willing to help us in everything, answering all our questions, making a big effort to please us and to give us the best time possible. The buffet for breakfast was really good, with some Vietnamese options allowing us to try new things, but also with some other things like eggs, bread, cereals, fruit. The decoration of the hotel is amazing, super cozy, the rooms were comfortable and clean. Very nice location, like 10 minutes walking from the beach and 20 minutes walking from the center. Definitely will come back, Da Nang was the best part of our trip!

Also there was a lot of construction work and mess in the area around the hotel. Hopefully it will be more calm and cozy when they are done 😊

review.rating: Schöner Aufenhalt in einem gemütlichen Boutique Hotel dank sehr netten Personal
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Sehr nettes und hilfsbereites Personal. Die Einrichtung war schön und gemütlich. Alles sehr unkompliziert von Wäsche waschen bis zum ausleihen eines Motorrollers. Das Frühstück war auch sehr lecker. Phoebe (Phuong) war 24/7 verfügbar um uns den Aufenthalt so gemütlich zu gestalten wie möglich. Sie war sehr zuvorkommend und hat auch Restaurantreservierungen für uns erledigt. Auch viele Tipps haben wir von ihr bekommen.
review.comment_negative: Es fehlt in den Räumen an Abstellfläche für z.B. Koffer. Es gibt im Bad zu wenige Haken, so dass wir unsere Handtücher immer über den Stuhl hängen mussten. Am zweiten Tag war unsere Bettwäsche leider nicht ganz so sauber.

Most amazingly helpful staff who went over and beyond to offer recommendations on what to see and do, where to eat, without being pushy. Great breakfast, not your usual buffet. Everything was done with care and attention to detail. A definite winner!

review.rating: Zimmer wie in einem grünen Garten
review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel ist das beste in der Stadt. Als alleinreisende fühlt man sich hier sehr wohl. Es ist wie in einem kleinen Blumengarten mit Fischteich. Im Innern gibt es viel Grün. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich. Sie sehen alles, was man braucht um sich wohl zu fühlen. Strand und Restaurants alles in nächster Nähe. Ich schätzte sehr, das es ein kleines übersichtliches Hotel ist. Nicht mit 1000 Zimmer. Dafür fühlt man sich hier wie in 1001 Nacht. Der Dach-Pool eignet sich nach einem Ausflug zum sich abzukühlen und der hektick zu entfliehen. Emma die gute Fee des Hauses brachte mich am Ende zum Flughafen mit ihrem Roller..
Das war natürlich ein Erlebnis pur. Immer gerne wieder.....für alle zu empfehlen.
Khách sạn có trang trí Noel khá ấm cúng, tạo không khí lễ hội.

review.comment_positive:
Wir fühlten uns sehr willkommen und gut bedient. Die jungen Mitarbeitenden sind sehr aufmerksam und hilfsbereit. Das Zimmer hat ein sehr durchdachtes und elegantes Design. Wir fühlten uns wohl und schliefen die zweite Nacht gut. (Angewöhnung). Das Frühstück war ausgezeichnet und abwechslungsreich. Wir können dieses Hotel empfehlen, es ist eine Oase mit einem schönen begrünten Innenhof und Brunnen und einem Pool im 6. Stockwerk (Dach). Wir haben die Atmosphäre in den bequemen Stühlen neben dem Pool dort oben am Abend und vor dem Frühstück genossen.
Zum Strand ist es zehn Fussminuten.

it was exactly like the pictures, very relaxing and calming. The hotel in general (room and common areas) is clean, the staff is super friendly and generous, all speak english and very helpful. I mentioned once that I really liked the coconut cookies and they offered me an entire box as a gift. really great hospitality. They also have chauffeur options, the driver was very professional and smiley and helpful and trust worthy.

review.rating: wonderful people at a very cool, comfy boutique hotel
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: the staff at this hotel is absolutely exceptional. The ladies go out of the their way to make every guest feel welcome and comfortable.
review.comment_negative: everything was great

review.comment_positive:
Thực sự mình rất ít khi review. Nhưng Minh Boutique là nơi rất đáng lựa chọn để nghỉ ngơi. Không thể không viết đôi lời bày tỏ sự hài lòng, thích thú và cảm kích :)))
1. Khách sạn có thiết kế kiến trúc rất đẹp, hay ho. Yên tĩnh và nhiều cây xanh.
2. Phòng ốc rất sạch sẽ. 
3. Đặc biệt mỗi phòng đều có 1 loa âm trần và phát nhạc du dương, nhẹ nhàng. Mình có thể điều chỉnh âm lượng/tắt loa nếu muốn. Sáng từ 7h là sẽ lại có nhạc. Sáng lúc mới ngủ dậy sẽ thường là nhạc nhẹ với tiếng chim hót :D nói chung là cái chi tiết loa này mình rất là thích thú.
4. Các bạn nhân viên rất dễ thương và cực nhiệt tình. 
Để mình chia sẻ câu chuyện liên quan vấn đề ăn sáng nha. Bé nhà mình mới 12,5 tháng. Vừa đến checkin là bạn lễ tân đã hỏi có muốn khách sạn chuẩn bị cháo cho bữa sáng của bé không rùi :)))) Đến sáng xuống ăn, mình có hỏi khách sạn có ghế ăn cho bé không thì bạn nhân viên bảo khum có. Mình cũng ok thui. K vấn đề j lắm. Tuy nhiên mình đang cho bé ăn được 1 lúc rùi thì bạn nhân viên đi đâu kiếm dc cái ghế ăn bằng gỗ cho bé. Hix. Các bạn quá là nhiệt tình luôn í :))))) Thực sự cảm ơn bạn nhân viên á.
5. Cô đầu bếp nấu ăn rất quan tâm bé nhà mình ăn có ngon miệng không. Cô nấu cháo cho bé còn lấy hạt sen của nhà cô để nấu nữa á :)))) Sự quan tâm và tận tình của cô như của một người bà với cháu của mình á :)))) Thực sự rất cảm ơn cô ạ.

review.rating: Kleine Wohlfühl Oase mit einmaligen Flair
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Die ganze Unterkunft ist optisch ein absoluter Hingucker und versprüht einmaligen Flair. Nettes und zuvorkommendes Personal sorgt dafür, dass man vom Check-In bis hin zum Frühstück und zur Organisation des Weitertransports eine gute Zeit hat. Die Atmosphäre beim Frühstück ist durch das offene Dach, den Teich und das viele Grün wirklich herausragend und etwas Besonderes. Die Zimmer bieten ausreichend Platz und bieten wie der Rest der Unterkunft einmaligen Flair, besonders die Dusche. Das Hotel liegt eine Seitenstraße neben der Wasserfront, wodurch es ruhig und entspannt ist. Den Rooftop Pool haben wir nicht benutzt, aber angeschaut, hier hätte man auf jeden Fall gut ausspannen können.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Le personnel, l'ambiance de l'hôtel et le design

review.rating: 女性スタッフは最高のホスピタリティでした
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
小規模でシンプルながらも清潔で落ち着いたモダンなデザインのホテルです。

ランドリーサービスもあり、1.5キロも洗濯に出しましたが、60.000ドンでした。朝出して、夜にはフロントに届いていました。

昨夜騒音で眠れなかったから部屋を替えてほしいと、朝食の際に女性スタッフに話したところ丁寧に謝罪され、快く対応してくれました。非常に細かな気遣いをしてくださり、チェックアウト時には、再度別の女性スタッフから謝罪を受け、空港までのタクシーを無料て呼んでくださいました。出発時には小さなギフトもいただきました。
review.comment_negative:
こちらのホテルに2泊しました。
1泊目は上階のプールの真下にある部屋でし
が、突然、深夜に隣のリネン室のようや部屋から大きなモーター音のような不快な音が不定期で鳴り始め、一晩中続きました。結局朝までまともに眠ることができませんでした。朝方にようやくうとうとし眠りにつけたタイミングで、プールにドボーンと飛び込む大きな音で目が覚め、朝6:00から騒がしく遊び始めた子供連れの家族がいて（プールは7:00オープン）、しばらく我慢しましたが耐えられないため、連れに直接注意してもらってもやめないため、フロントに電話し、注意をしてもらうよう頼みました。が、待っても待ってもホテルの人は現れず、20分以上経ってから注意に男性スタッフが来たようでした。それでも飛び込みや騒ぎはおさまりませんでした。
結局眠るのは諦め、朝食に向かいました。非常に不快な辛い目覚めでした。
こちらのホテルは上階以外の部屋がよさそうです。

review.comment_positive: Ánh sáng trong phòng dịu nhẹ, tạo cảm giác thư giãn.
Die Ausstattung und das interior Design.
review.comment_negative: Dass es am Bett keinen Lichtschalter gibt.  Man tappt förmlich im Dunkeln.

review.rating: Best place to stay in Da Nang
review.comment_positive: Lovely hotel, very clean and great facilities
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: it is nicely decorated
review.comment_negative:
Deluxe rooms are very small, dark and humid.
no space at all to move around, especially in the bathroom.
the bedsheets are damp with humidity and the smell is persistent.
they burn essential oil to try to mask it.
the rooms with garden view face the corridor with very large window so if you want privacy you need to pull the curtain. it’s the only source of natural light.
The breakfast is not great either. limited choice and small quantities so they run out very fast and you have to wait.
When we checked out the staff asked how we found the hotel so I mentioned everything I wrote, their comment was ‘we are very sorry and we hope that next time it will be better but please don’t give us a low rating on Booking.com as we need to achieve our target’…
I am not certain their marketing strategy is top notch…

review.comment_positive:

review.rating: Wonderful Boutique Hotel near the Beach in a Great Location
review.comment_positive:
This was perhaps our favorite hotel during our 30 day Vietnam visit to multiple cities and National Parks.   The public spaces were beautifully decorated.    We loved the open courtyard with the small pond and planters, complete with colorful fish and even a visiting toad, during the evening.  The seating areas and restaurant adjacent to the pond were terrific places to relax. It rained during our visit, and we loved that it fell into the pond and open courtyard, but we could sit close-by under ceiling and stay dry.  The greenery throughout the hotel, both inside and out, was a lovely touch, and nicely juxtaposed to the cement-jungle of Danang.

The staff were super accommodating and spoke enough English to communicate well.   They had a very good and reasonably priced laundry service.  I asked for a couple of sewing repairs,  and they had someone outside the hotel do it.   When they discovered that I preferred less meat and enjoyed tofu, they made a special trip to the local  “market” to some for my breakfasts.    We felt very cared for as guests.

Our room was wonderful. There was lots of wood and the decor was pretty and comfortable, including our bed.   While we did not take advantage of the kitchenette, except for the small fridge, it was a nice option.  It was terrific how our large room windows looked over the courtyard from the sitting area and streets from our bath area.   Plus, there were adequate window coverings. We liked that the shower was separated from the toilet and that the sink area was separated from both.  This gave us more flexibility when needing those facilities.  (The only downside was the little step-ups between the bathroom and room, where we kept stubbing our toes when leaving the bathroom.  It would be helpful if they put small wedges there to prevent this from happening.)

Unfortunately, during our last night, our ceiling in the bathroom area, sprung a leak.  The hotel staff were equally surprised and handled the incident graciously.
review.comment_negative: little “step-ups” between to bathroom and bedroom

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
staff is outstanding - they shouldn’t be mistreated by management if they are doing their best and it’s not their fault that the hotel layout or architecture sucks. The staff are all super friendly and respectful. asked how was our sleep, provided one way airport transportation for us, killed the spider in the middle of the night when we called, and gave us free laundry for stating about no hot water. 

the lobby is pretty
review.comment_negative:
We chose this hotel specifically for the penthouse room, thinking it’ll be a nice and relaxing last few days for our vacation and new years. But super disappointed as it was highly uncomfortable and stressful. For the price point of $460 USD we could have gotten a way better room / hotel. The issue we had are like basic needs / basic things hotels should not have any issues with such as - 


- No hot water - it only lasts for 5 minutes or so. Also the main reason we got this room is for the tub and the hot water runs out every few minutes and then we have to wait 10  minutes and the tub doesn’t even fill half way. So we couldn’t even use it. 
- Mold on shower head - shower head is also short so our head is eye level with the mold too.  
- Spiders/ bugs ( 4 - top of mirror, tub, on my clothes, outside ac vent) - one night we got the front desk to exterminate one of them in the vent because it was pretty big. 
- Bed pillow smells like mildew / damp smell !
- Super loud due to thin glass/ walls - you hear everythinggg outside. Woke up so many times through the night 

Others
- Shower head too short - we have to bend down to shower  
- No mirror light .. it’s so dark at night and can’t even see anything by the sink
- Way too cold in the open bathroom concept 
- Spider webs between wall cracks


Yes the hotel lobby is beautiful and the staff has outstanding service but the room itself does not live close to the standards we expect for that type of price point ($460 USD).

review.comment_positive: 我们在这里住了三晚，住的很开心，房间干净，早餐丰富，这里的工作人员也很友善，他们给我们推荐了附近的餐厅，我们连续吃了两天，非常棒的推荐！这个酒店有一项服务很贴心，他们会根据你的国籍推荐和你对接的工作人员，以便给你更好的帮助。和我们对接的是Phoebe，她会讲中文！我们中间遇到了一点问题，她很快想办法帮我们解决了，很感谢她！我对这里的印象很好！

review.comment_positive:
우선 위치가 적당히 시내랑 가깝고 각종 맛집들이나 마사지샵들과도 적당한 거리에 있어서 가격대비 위치는 좋은 것 같습니다
실내 시설도 쾌적한 편이고 직원 분들이 모두 친절하셔서 좋았습니다 
특히 마지막 날 시간이 떠서 공항으로 가는 시간까지 호텔 로비에서 시간을 보냈는데 직원 분께서 저는 임산부라고 각종 과일을 썰어넣은 요거트와 남편에게는 코코넛커피를 서비스로 내어주시면서 세심하게 챙겨주셨습니다 그런 점들이 아주 감동적이었고 친근하게 다가오시려고 한 진심이 와닿았어서 참 좋았습니다 ^^ 
조식이 메뉴 개수는 정말 적습니다만 전체적으로 음식이 다 깔끔하였고 직원 분들이 계속 챙겨봐주시는 정성이 느껴져서 좋았습니다 
(참고로 주변에 마사지는 도보 3분거리에 아리스파와 조금 더 먼 10분 거리의 허벌 부티크 스파 추천드리고 맛집은 10분 거리의 통킨분짜나 5분 거리의 베빌론스테이크 추천 드립니다^^)
review.comment_negative:
방음이 좋지 않아 하필 숙소 주변의 가라오케가 많은데 금토일 밤에는 특히나 시끄러운 소리가 다 들립니다 또 아침에는 조용해서인지 5층에 묵었음에도 1층 식당의 접시 소리가 들릴 정도로 소리가 잘 들립니다 ㅠㅠ 이어플러그를 준비해가신다면 좋을 것 같습니다
그리고 기후 특성상 더 그렇겠지만 숙소 안에 침구가 습해서 처음에는 냄새도 살짝 났습니다 이런 부분에 민감하신 분들은 침구 교환을 요청하거나 조금 유의하셔야할 것 같아요
그리고 숙소 객실따라 다를 수도 있겠지만 객실 안에 구조가 다소 불편한 점이 있었습니다 이건 사람마다도 다르겠지만 거울이 세면대에 하나밖에 없고 그 앞에 물건들을 두기에 공간이 턱없이 부족합니다 욕실에도 가져온 세면도구 등을 놔둘 공간이 없어서 이 점은 불편했습니다 
그리고 욕실에서 샤워할 때 따뜻한 물이 어느 정도 시간이 지나고나면 잘 나오지 않고 미지근하거나 내지는 약간 차가운 물밖에 나오지 않아 다소 불편했습니다 그리고 화장실 문을 열 때 문 바로 앞 블라인드가 계속 걸리적 거려서 한 번에 문을 열 수가 없거나 부딪히는 경우도 많습니다 이거는 블라인드 방향을 잘 조절하셔야 덜 불편하실 것 같아요
그리고 침대 바로 앞 공간이 불과 얼마 없고 신발을 벗는 공간에 책상과 옷장이 있는데 이 공간이 비교적 넓습니다 캐리어를 놓으실 공간이나 그런 짐들을 놓을 데가 잘 없어 불편할 때가 있을 것 같습니다 침대 옆으로나 앞에 캐리어를 놓게되면 꼭 반대쪽 욕실을 통해 한바퀴를 돌아나가야 반대쪽으로 나갈 수 있거나 아니면 아예 신발을 한 번 신고 옆으로 이동해야하는 구조입니다 아마 보시면 아시겠지만 이게 은근히 불편하더라구요 좋은 점들은 크게크게 많았는데 불편한 점은 은근히 불편한 점이라 사소하지만 자잘하게 좀 있네요^^

- Power outlet is not close to the bed for charging phones.
- There is nowhere to hang things like clothes if they get wet in the rain and need to dry.
Neither of these is a big deal, just suggestions.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel, great location, nice staff
review.comment_positive:
- helpful & friendly staff (greeted with coconut biscuits & tea on arrival)
- room; clean & had a comfortable bed 
- great location; close to the beach
- breakfast; a few options (buffet, plus noodles to order / eggs to order)
- beautiful koi pond / garden in reception
- nice pool (though only 2 sun loungers)
review.comment_negative:
We gave some of the below feedback to Reception when asked & they very kindly gave us bottled water & packets of coconut cookies as a thank you:
 
- room; aesthetically pleasing but not very practical. A few examples: only one plug socket in the studio kitchen / bedroom, but 4 in the bathroom! No light switches near the bed, bedside tables/shelves, or reading lamps. Not much counter space in the bathroom for doing makeup 
- breakfast; items aren’t covered so sometimes there are small fruit flies around the food 
- sound insulation; we were on the top floor (5) with only the pool above us but could hear what sounded like heavy furniture being dragged at random times of night / early morning. could also hear plates & cutlery clanging in the morning, presumably being washed. there’s also a very(!) loud karaoke bar behind the hotel that didn’t stop til about 1am on a Sunday night

review.rating: Lovely boutique hotel - great place to stay
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: The size of the room, the decor, the lobby area with the little pond with koi fish, the breakfast buffet food, the location to the beach.
review.comment_negative:
These are minor comments: The bathroom sink area did not have enough space to hang a small hand towel after you wash your hands or face.  The shower and toilet doors have a horizontal bar to hang clothes or towels, but maybe an additional hook on the wall would be good too.

Did not like how the curtains were installed in the queen room with garden view.  This room has a door with glass panel.  The curtains open from the left (where the door is located) to the right. Because it opens from the door side, people walking pass the room can see inside the room through the door.  Not much privacy with curtains opened. Suggestion:  It would be better if the front door has it's own separate door shade, (door blind or door shade).  The way it is,  people walking pass the room can see guests inside as well as their stuff. 
Despite these minor comments, I would definitely return to this hotel again because it's just a wonderful place to stay. 👍

review.rating: An exceptional hotel with friendly service, immaculate rooms, great breakfast, and a central location!
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
A true gem in Vietnam! We spent only two nights at this fantastic hotel, which, however, exceeded our expectations by far. We've been traveling through Vietnam for some time now, but this hotel is undoubtedly the best in its price range. Upon our arrival, we were warmly greeted by the staff who immediately infected us with their good spirits and positive atmosphere. Their service deserves highest praise as they were always friendly and helpful. The concept of the interior design is well-thought-out and creates a welcoming atmosphere. Our room was spotlessly clean and was thoroughly cleaned daily. The pool area is also a highlight, and we enjoyed relaxing there. Additionally, we were able to easily rent a motorbike, which made our stay even more enjoyable. I can wholeheartedly recommend this hotel – you definitely can't go wrong here!
Furthermore, I must mention that the breakfast was also excellent and fully satisfying. It truly complemented our stay. The location of the hotel is also excellent, as it is very central, making it convenient to explore the surrounding area. We would definitely love to visit this hotel again in the future.

Die Köchin und gute Seele des Hauses Em Ma war super und das Essen schmeckte einfach super! Der Inhaber des Hotels ist ein Architekt und das sieht man auch, sehr cool gemacht! Beste Unterkunft während unserer 3 Wöchigen Reise!

The staff is able to book rides to anywhere in the area including Hoi An. Definitely recommend for anyone wanting to stay in Da Nang away from the busyness of the bars along the river.

The staff were friendly especially Phoebe who made sure we were well taken care of. Only one small issue, we had arranged to be picked up from the airport with this hotel, but there was no driver there to greet us when we arrived. We had to borrow someone's phone to make a quick call, and the driver was there within 10-15 minutes. Other than that it was a nice place to stay
Very friendly and warm staff! The hotel was absolutely beautiful and we could not have been happier.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive:
1. 대단한 호텔식 뷔패를 생각한다면 아닙니다.
  - 아주 가볍게 드실수 있는 간단한 메뉴 몇가지가 있을뿐 그이상이하도 아닙니다.
2. 독특한 형태의 건물입니다. 
3. 만약 방을 이용하실거라면 가급적 디럭스 부터 사용하세요.
4. 개인적으로 팬트하우스는 추천하지않습니다.
  - 수영장 바로옆에 있더라구요.
review.comment_negative:
1. 방에 아주 큰 통창이 있습니다.  통창이 대부분 바로앞 객실을 향하고있어서, 사생활 노출이 그대로됩니다.
 - 모든방이 동일하게 그렇게되어있어서 저희는 계속 커탠을 치고 지냈습니다.
2. 현재 다낭은 코로나로 인하여 복구중에있습니다. 그렇기때문에, 호텔주변에 구경하며 먹을만한 것들이 현재 없습니다.
 (이것은 어느호텔을 가도 똑같아요,)

review.rating: As a couple we loved our stay
review.comment_positive: We loved everything, awesome pool on the roof, exceptional breakfast buffet every morning, superb location - almost at the beach but still close to city center, we loved trip to Mỹ Sơn Sanctuary that hotel arranged for us (driver took the best care for us) .. i really have only praise for the staff.
review.comment_negative:
Just small petty things - On some nights there was loud karaoke outside of the hotel, but i can't really blame hotel for this (loud karaoke is part of vietnamese culture and is heard almost everywhere) although it's true the rooms could have been built with better sound isolation (for example if someone is moving with chairs in the room above yours it is really loud/

We would have spent much more money at the hotel if they offered alcoholic drinks :-D "un"fortunately they offer only non-alcoholic drinks (smoothies, yogurt drinks, coffee) which were awesome but still little disapppinted by the selection offered by the hotel.

review.comment_positive:
There are only two good things about this hotel: 
the first is the design, it’s made with a good taste. Contemporary yet reflects local culture and nature.
the second is the stuff, they really try hard to cover all disappointments.
review.comment_negative:
The hotel is seriously overrated and probably overpriced. We had to change three rooms and at some point i just gave up.

Noisy air conditioning is annoying and disturbs while sleeping.

Absolutely NO soundproofing. After we changed the room with noisy air con, we were offered a room at the 5th floor, nice and spacious but the windows are facing a night club and it was Friday night. at 11 pm I had a feeling I was right on the dance floor. The room 204 where we had to retreat is overlooking the hotel entrance and a bar area and I could hear people talking since early in the morning. 

Not exactly clean hotel, spider net in the corners, grey spots on the bed linen. 

Breakfast is poor, you’ll get your fried eggs, but coffee was a big problem for me (like in most places in Vietnam).

review.comment_positive: The hotel interior is very beautiful. The staff are very kind and friendly, they had great recommendations for restaurants. The bed was very comfortable. Great value for money
The room and a
Overall ambience was charming and welcoming, very pleasant feel. Rooms were spacious and we had a great view overlooking the pond. value for money.
review.comment_negative: The only downside is bathrooms were a bit small especially the toilet and shower -  it was very hard to close the door without clipping my fingers. U might have to leave the toilet door open if you're a much bigger or taller person.. breakfast was ok, some local cuisine but just a few choices. The other downside is we got very old towels that didn't look fresh nor pleasant but that's about it. Location is quite a walk to the beach but manageable.

review.rating: Best hotel in Vietnam during our trip
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Minh Boutique was our first stay in Vietnam. Since then we stayed at 5 other different accommodation and then could not get even close to the stay at minh boutique.

The staff is amazing the food is fantastic and the surrounding are astonishing. 
My wife is an interior architect and she was amazed by how well planned and designed minh boutique is.

The one in the middle is great. If you als they will also let your kids feed the fish.

All in all a 10/10
review.comment_negative:
The only bad thing about minh boutique is that all other accommodations will not be able to compete.
As minh boutique was our first stay in Vietnam it sort of set a standard for us. You should not make the same mistake or you will meet a lot of disappointments afterwards ;)

Either book minh boutique at the end of your stay as a highlight or book it knowing that it is outstanding.
