review.rating: Không khí, phong cảnh, deco và thái độ nhân viên tốt
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Các bạn nhân viên cực kì thân thiện, có 1 chút vấn đề về phòng nhưng các bạn xử lý rất chu đáo. Tầng 1 có 1 đàn cá KOI mũm mỉm, phòng deco đẹp. Khách sạn có thể có thiếu sót nhưng cho 10 điểm vì thái độ của các bạn nhân viên.
review.comment_negative: Can skip.

review.rating: Charming hotel, close to the beach
review.comment_positive: Minh Boutique is a charming property in Da Nang. We stayed here for 7 nights in two different rooms. The rooms are spacious, clean and have comfortable beds. The hotel staff is friendly and attentive. They offer a laundry service, which is slightly expensive but very convenient.
review.comment_negative:
The hotel is very Instagram-friendly, and the pictures posted on the booking are kind of misleading. Most of the pictures are taken from the penthouse - which is one room in the entire hotel. The terrace is not that great, especially at this time of the year - the pool is not heated, there are two chairs, and the pillows look quite dirty. 
Breakfast - we took it only once, during our 7-night stay - we missed fresh/warm food - a lack of fresh fruit, juices, and warm food options. It looked way better on the pictures, and we expected more. 
The lack of electricity plug in the studio looking to the garden - it is kind of annoying to have only 2 plugs in the whole room.
The noise - there is no soundproofing, we could hear the person next to our room sneeze. Also, the aircon is loud. 
Overall, the price-to-quality ratio is quite bad. It is pricy for what you get unless your goal is to take some pics for the social media.

review.rating: amazing design, warm service. Definitely comeback again and will recommend for friends for sure
review.comment_positive: design, evironment, service, price worthily
review.comment_negative: none

review.comment_positive: All the staff were very accommodating to our needs, especially when we came in a big group. They provided cost effective means of transportation and recommended places of interest in accordance to our likings. We also had medical emergencies that were handled very well despite the regular working hours. Before the trip, they requested for our passport copies for a smooth check-in process. I really admired the proactiveness of the staff. Overall, this is an awesome place to stay....I'll surely come again.

this property is fantastic! we loved it so much that we decided to stay for another 2 nights and cancelled the other hotel.

the rooms were clean, modern shower and facilities. lovely patio with the Koi fish.

the staff were incredible. particularly Mun who helped us so much with our stay and arrangements.

I have already recommended the hotel to two travellers on a holiday in Vietnam and when we come back to Da Nang, we will certainly come back!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Die Minh Boutique ist eine kleine Oase. Sie liegt in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße, es sind nur ein paar Meter zum Strand.
Die Zimmer sind sehr schön und sauber.
Das Bett war sehr bequem und die Dusche war ebenfalls sehr gut. 
Das Frühstück war genial, es gab eine riesige Auswahl und es war lecker. Das Personal ist sehr zuvorkommend und super freundlich. Wir haben viele Tips bekommen und sogar Touren für unseren nächsten Aufenthalt in Hoi An organisiert bekommen, was super hilfreich war.
Der Aufenthalt war rundum eine schöne Erfahrung und absolut empfehlenswert.

浴室有一片窗戶的玻璃不見了 用透明塑膠布及膠帶暫時貼住⋯房間窗簾明顯發霉。簡易廚房的抽屜還有前一位房客留下的垃圾⋯
住了兩晚，第一天回飯店時發現房間落地窗(出入口)沒有鎖…應是房務離開時沒鎖好，感覺很差。

review.rating: Number one choice in Da Nang
review.comment_positive: Incredible great value for money at this beautiful Boutique Hotel. The staff of the hotel is super friendly and very helpful, they made me feel home. The location is not far from the beach and in a very nice and quite area of Da Nang. You can rent a motorcycle for 150k Dong at the reception, the best bike I had during my trip in Vietnam. Thanks for your great hospitality.

review.rating: Comfortable but still can be improved
review.comment_positive:
Nice decoration
Helpful staff
Comfortable bed
review.comment_negative:
Average breakfast, a lot of options are cold like steamed dumplings or steamed bun, which shouldn’t be cold. 
The penthouse bathroom has design issue, open to the outside, no option to close the window, so a bit cold to take a shower when it’s around 20 degree due to the wind
The deluxe bathroom also had design issue, water cannot flow down, and leaks outside when we take a shower.
Room lack full body mirror and some lighting, and a safe box. 
Location very far from the true city center, around the hotel it’s still under development, a lot of tourist targeted restaurant and spa.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Cudowne miejsce, oaza spokoju i stylu. Zupełnie inne niż cały Da Nang. Świetny basen na dachu, znakomite śniadanie, bardzo zielono i klimatycznie.
review.comment_negative: Hałas klimatyzacji. Bez zatyczek do uszu ciężko spać, ale to jest problem dotyczący chyba wszystkich moich noclegów w Wietnamie.

review.rating: Great service, Great comfort, Great atmosphere.
review.comment_positive: Exceptional customer service. Beautiful atmosphere. Comfortable bed. Rooftop pool. Speedy laundry. Really effective aircon. They are just the best. This was my second stay, cant recommend it enough.
review.comment_negative: More lighting around the bathroom mirror.

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Location is perfect.. close to the beach and the bridge. And the design.. top class

review.rating: Thank you for everything. I would like to visit again

review.comment_positive: I loved the ambiance& traditional vibe. I felt so peaceful. The music system in our rooms quite impressive as if I am in the spa or doing meditation so I can fall in sleep peacefully. The lobby and pool amazing. This place worth more than the value.
review.comment_negative: Well I am sorry to say this but the taste of coffee. I had better coffee at Saigon and Hanoi hotels.

Las chicas de recepción te dan la bienvenida con te y galletas y lo mismo al marchar.

El desayuno muy bueno y variado.
La piscina en el rooftop, espectacular!
Un 10 de hotel!!!

review.rating: Great value for money. Amazing stay in Da Nang would definetly recommend if you are coming

The music in the room is a fun touch we have never seen before.
review.comment_negative: Nothing bad, sometimes feels weitd having a window as a door so it feel less private. Yes you can put the courtain but then you loose light. But thats just me trying to look for something

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
TikTokで見つけて宿泊しましたが、
期待以上にとにかくオシャレで、清潔で、快適でした♪
スタッフの方はみなさん親切で、気さくでした。
朝食もメニュー豊富で美味しかったです。
とにかくフォーが美味しかったので、前日の夜ごはんを軽めにしておくことをおすすめします！
ダナンで他のホテルにも宿泊しましたが一番気に入りました！
周りに自信を持っておすすめしたいホテルです。
review.comment_negative: 特にないです！

review.comment_positive:
It’s a very cute cozy hotel. Room is very clean and comfortable that it feels like home. I really like the design.
Staff are very friendly and helpful. Everyone takes care of you like family and friends. 
Hotel’s breakfast is great and tasty. A very good way to start your day.
Location is very good. It’s in a quiet neighborhood but only a short walk to the beach and also lots of restaurants within walking distance. Going to the city center is a short grab ride. 
I strongly recommend staying here if you visit Da Nang.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Interesting design but lacked comfort details
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Loved hearing the bird song with the music, interesting architecture, comfortable bed
review.comment_negative: It wasn’t very private as the rooms all face each other.  It lacked furniture and there were no side tables or bed lights. On two separate days the staff failed to collect the laundry even though it was placed in the laundry basket in the middle of the room.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: O hotel é muito bonito, café da manhã excelente! Os funcionários são extremamente atenciosos. Banho bom! Localização otima

很喜歡飯店的風格裝飾! 每個地方都很漂亮!植物環繞、房間有音樂、有香氛蠟燭，讓人聞了很放鬆，房間的床也很舒適!
飯店人員也都很親切，很注重客人的住房感受，因為接近生日，還特別準備很好吃的巧克力蛋糕，櫃台人員跟我說那個小蛋糕是他們覺得峴港最好的BAKERY，還推薦給我真的很感動!
處處感受到他們對房客的用心，早餐的部分比較普通，但飯店外面的飲料店!! 超級amazing!我們點了服務人員推薦的椰子咖啡和草莓優格飲都超好喝，尤其是椰子咖啡，是我在峴港喝到最好喝的椰子咖啡!
整體來說:飯店舒服漂亮、椰子咖啡超好喝、服務人員服務超棒! 下次若有來峴港會再入住!

I really love the hotel's stylish decoration! Every corner is beautiful! The surroundings are filled with plants, and the rooms have music and scented candles, which create a relaxing atmosphere. The bed in the room is also very comfortable!
The hotel staffs are very friendly and attentive to the guests' experience. As my birthday was approaching, they specially prepared a delicious chocolate cake for me. The front desk staff told me that the little cake is from the best bakery in Danang, and I was truly touched by their recommendation!
I could feel their dedication to the guests everywhere. The breakfast was average, but the beverage shop outside the hotel was amazing! We tried the coconut coffee and strawberry yogurt drink recommended by the staff, and they were both delicious, especially the coconut coffee, which was the best coconut coffee I've ever had in Danang!
Overall, the hotel is comfortable and beautiful, and the coconut coffee is amazing. The service provided by the staff is excellent! I will definitely stay here again if I come to Danang next time!

review.rating: 예쁘고 깔끔한데 살짝 애매한 숙소 입니다.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
직원분들이 정말 친절해요!
숙소가 정말 예뻐서 좋았어요.
쇼핑몰 촬영 겸 간 곳이어서 정말 좋았어요.
조식도 괜찮았습니다.
위치도 해변에서 가까워서 걸어서 5~10분 딱 걸려요
수영장도 깨끗하고 좋았어요! 진짜 예뻤습니다
review.comment_negative:
세면대가 좀 불편했습니다. 
수도꼭지와 세면대가 좀 잘 맞지않는 느낌?
조식이 개미와 간간히 공존해야하지만 벌레를 안 무서워해서 그냥 털고 먹었습니다.
프라이버시에 예민하신 분들은 안 가시는 걸 추천드립니다.
통유리로된 문이 마주보고 있는 구조로 되어 있어서
커튼을 치면 안이 다 보여요.
그렇게 예민한 편은 아니여서 잘 지냈습니다.

review.comment_positive: The property was very beautiful and the koi pond was our favourite. The rooms were very cozy and clean. The location was amazing, close to most major areas. Our hostess, Mun, was extremely kind and warm and helped us a lot throughout our stay. We definitely plan on returning soon.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive:
Das Team war super freundlich, sehr zuvorkommend und immer hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Das Hotel hatte ein offenes Konzept und einen Teich in der Mitte. Sieht alles sehr schön aus. Das Frühstück war super. Neben dem wechselnden asiatischen Buffet gab es noch eine dazubuchbare Auswahl an Eierspeisen oder einer Pho.
Lage war auch in Ordnung. Roller konnte man über das Hotel buchen, kostenfreie Fahrräder gäbe es auch.
Die Zimmer hatten eine angemessene Größe und waren schön.
review.comment_negative: Nur eine Kleinigkeit: das Licht in unseren Schränken hatte sich nachts selbständig eingeschaltet weil der Kontakt zwischen Schranktür und Lichtschalter nicht mehr richtig funktioniert

review.comment_positive: really enjoyed my stay, the staff were lovely, would recommend to anyone!

review.comment_negative: The room has different levels, so I kept bumping into the steps, the bathroom sink was kind of small. I was not a big fan of the big windows staring into other rooms, lacks privacy.

review.comment_positive: スタッフの対応がとてもすばらしく、非常に快適に過ごせた。ホテル内の雰囲気も良かっった

review.comment_negative: Rien

review.rating: 5* service at a beautiful boutique hotel
review.comment_positive:
Fantastic hotel on a quiet street within 5 minute walk of My Khe beach and plenty of restaurants!
Walked in and straight away we got a welcome drink and biscuits! We managed to check in earlier and hire a scooter straight away to head to Ba Na Hills which was fantastic as we only had two days to explore Da Nang. Beautiful exterior and interior design with lovely rooms. Breakfast was very nice and the staff are absolute stars! Very attentive, they could not do enough for you and do a fantastic job of making sure every guest is happy. We will we could have stayed longer! Would recommend to anyone staying in Da Nang!

review.rating: Definitely stay here if you're visiting Da Nang.
review.comment_positive: Minh Boutique had one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in at a hotel. The noodles they offered for breakfast were also super delicious.
Clean and comfortable bed. Beautiful, relaxing property. Staff exceptional especially Lan, Van and Vi. Loved the tea and coconut biscuits on arrival.
review.comment_negative: They had no availability for another night.

review.rating: Relaxing, peaceful place to stay a couple of days.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
The property was well located, off the main road so a little quieter, but easy walking distance to the beach, spas and places to eat. It felt safe to walk around at night.

The staff are amazing. Couldn’t be friendlier, couldn’t do enough for you. Always available with a smile on their face. 

The hotel is very nicely furnished. It’s all very relaxing, from the glass fronts to the rooms, rustic concrete and wood fittings and small touches like speakers playing tranquil music throughout (don’t worry, this can be turned off in your room if it’s not to your liking).

All in, very nice hotel and easy recommendation.
review.comment_negative: My only small gripe would be that there was no food served in the evening. I’m really grasping at straws to criticise as my stay was exceptional. There are plenty of great places to eat within a two or three minute walk.

Everything was as positively informed in advance (by the pictures and guests comments) and staffs were very friendly and attentive! I had my birthday coming during my stay and they prepared a cake for me, and what was even sweeter was that they kept sending me sweet words!  Very well kept and run boutique hotel which I’d recommend to all my friends and family!

Service is top class. Phoebe was very helpful with everything from laundry service, recommendations of restaurants and transport/tickets to Ba Na hills.
Highly recommend this place

review.comment_positive: Hotel was beautiful and location was good; not in a busy area but near lots of restaurants, cafes, pharmacy and convenience store. Bed was comfortable and service was excellent. Laundry service was fast and affordable. Staff were very helpful and attentive.
review.comment_negative: Room design isn't the most convenient. Could have used bedside tables and more space in the bathroom for toiletries. The garden view room was weird cos it looked into the centre of the hotel so everyone could look into each other's rooms if the curtains were opened to enjoy the view.

review.comment_positive: Very great hotel!! The interior design is very elegant & beautiful. Everything is very clean. The staff was very very friendly and help you with everything you need. They message you via message and whatever you want, they assist you with. The beds were very comfortable. The pool upstairs has a jacuzzi function and has an amazing view. The location of the hotel is great, very close by to everything you need. You can rent a motorbike directly with the hotel for a very cheap price. And the breakfast buffet was amazing, so so tasty.
The hotel's interior was good-looking, the bed was comfortable, and the staff was welcoming.
review.comment_negative: The room I booked was supposed to have a bathtub, according to its description on Booking.com, but it didn't, and the staff didn't really do anything to compensate for it. Also, the room had limited hot water in the shower, and the staff didn't act at all to repair that, even after repeated complaints. After two nights of taking cold showers, my solution was to cancel the rest of my stay and look for another hotel.

review.rating: absolutely beautiful! we’ll definitely come back!
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
this is why I like booking at Boutique hotels. i love everything about Minh Boutique! it’s pretty, cozy, and it has a beautiful koi pond which my son Pierce really enjoyed. Our room had enough space and we liked the cute bathroom window. i love Minh boutique’s small details, so authentic (beautiful tea sets, the wooden accent wall, the hanging boats at the breakfast lounge). what I love most are the staff! it was my son’s 7th birthday so I had MUN (the manager) prepare a cake. in the hotel they play centralized music which can be heard in all rooms (there is a switch to adjust the volume in the room) and they played happy birthday before they knocked on our door.  Mun and the hotel staff came in with my son’s birthday cake and sang him a happy birthday song!  thank you for making our trip even more special. 

the hotel looks new but with some beautiful traditional Vietnamese touches on the design. it’s clean, it smells wonderful, and it has a beautiful garden view. Mun was very helpful, she handed me a pocket brochure that serves as a guide, it has a list of things to do, places to visit, and cafes and restaurants to check out around Da Nang. i had no idea there’s a light show at the bridge on weekends and she suggested we see it. my son really enjoyed the show at the bridge:) 

thanks Minh boutique, Mun, and the rest of the staff.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel, service (not due to a lack of trying) a bit lacking
review.comment_positive: The staff was really friendly. The hotel itself is very beautiful, the pond in the middle, the chirping birds, the rooftop swimming pool and the room itself.
review.comment_negative: There were no conveniently placed power sockets, but that is minor (we charged our phone in the bathroom). The breakfast was nothing special, it is worth mentioning they had a very strange-looking spaghetti Bolognese. We didn't dare to come to close. Otherwise, breakfast was fine. The day before we left, we asked them to do our laundry, which they accepted and said they would be ready the same day. However, when we asked the following morning before we wanted to leave, it was not ready. In the end they rushed it to us (still a bit wet, not that bad), but we needed to wait on it before we could leave. Couldn't book us a cheap bus somewhere, only expensive private transfers. They are really friendly and try to help you, just not always able do it the right way.

Понравилось абсолютно все. 
Милота в отеле зашкаливает, все чисто, красиво. 
Говоря о сервисе, я такое нигде не видела😍Все подсказали, куда поехать, что посмотреть, машину подготовили для удобства, билеты купили, все было на высшем уровне. Отдельно хочу отметить девочку Young, которая помогала нам во всем, была всегда на связи, просто душка♥️

review.rating: Wonderful boutique hotel with charm and heart
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
I can only say: if you're coming to Da Nang, stay at Minh Boutique. After over a week of travelling in Vietnam, arriving at this hotel was the best feeling. Best hotel we have found on this holiday so far. All the staff are so friendly and helpful.
The room is not huge but it is very comfortable, well designed and decorated, you have everything you need. Loved little extra touches like the slippers, bathrobes, essential oil and soft music.
Very nice breakfast offer, not big but great quality (additional dishes available, just ask!)

Thank you Minh Boutique

review.comment_positive: Everything was excellent, the staff were extremely kind and helpful. Young went above and beyond to ensure we were happy and all our expectations were met.

review.comment_positive: The staff are very friendly, and eager to help with everything! The room is nice, spacious and clean. The location is good and they provide free bicycle.

review.comment_positive: Total herzliche Betreiber. Wünsche werden sehr spontan und flexibel umgesetzt, einfach toll! Sehr zu empfehlen!!

We enjoyed the tranquil nature with lovely koi pond and singing pair of birds.  Spacious and clean bedroom with pool at roof top offers view around city.   Tucked in a lane that provides quiet environment and the amazing beach is just 5 mins walk away!  Good location with variety of seafood and local cuisine restaurants.  Nice spread of breakfast and one can order meal of the day for free during breakfast.  Do try their pho noodle soup!  Fixed our room aircon and their staff are always ever ready attentive, caring and welcoming.  Awesome experience 👏 👍 👍 👍

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Cet établissement a une identité singulière et dégage une certaine sérénité. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent et le service clientèle est parfait. Young à la réception a été très attentionné avec nous, pour exemple, lors du petit déjeuner nous avons demandé à une employée s’il avait du lait végétal, ce qui n’était pas le cas. A notre sortie, Young nous a donné 4 petits berlingots du lait présenté et s’en est excusée. Petit welcome drink et departure drink, super. Avec découverte de petit biscuit à la noix de coco, offert aussi, à chacun. Je recommande cet établissement !

review.comment_positive:
A lovely boutique hotel. 25ish rooms. Personable. Great value and excellent service. The type of place they won’t forget your name.

Big shout out to chef Thi (Emma), Lan, Phuong for taking such good care of me!!
review.comment_negative: Breakfast doesn’t need to be buffet style since it’s such a small hotel. I imagine a lot of wasted food. I think breakfast can be made to order and ordered off a menu or something.

review.rating: Really happy with my stay, would recommend.
review.comment_positive: Staff were super helpful. Location and facilities great for the price

Beautiful wooden architectural details from the outside entrance to the reception area are the first thing we noticed. We were warmly welcomed with cold tea and coconut biscuits by the serene koi pond. Our garden view rooms were very comfortable and thoughtfully laid out. We liked the clean modern aesthetic in the wooden chairs and handles in the bathroom area. The sink was a beautiful granite bowl. Enjoyed the piped in music and bird sounds. You control the volume or can turn it off if you don’t want to listen to it.
Looking down into the interior garden from our 5th floor rooms was special. 
We enjoyed swimming in the lovely rooftop infinity pool each day. 
Breakfast was delicious with many choices of Vietnamese food. Western egg choices and toast were also available. 
Also just a short walk to My Khe beach! 
Friendly helpful staff. 

We would stay here again.
review.comment_negative:
Outside our rooms was a wooden box with room number and you could toggle down the “makeup room” or “do not disturb” wooden sign. It was a unique and cool feature. 
Would have been helpful to have been shown this when we checked in. 
Some Bath Towels and bed linens were frayed. 
Replacing those would be nice.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Very pretty hotel and extremely nice and helpful staff. Breakfast was one of the best I’ve had at hotels in this budget range. Close enough to the beach. But the room we got at least was quite claustrophobic (small, sink outside the bathroom, windows facing a wall, no other window looking inside into the open area). I appreciate the design thinking that went into creating this place but a bit more thought could’ve done into room design. Make sure to check the type of room you’re booking!
The staff were exceptional. Friendly, warm and helpful

review.comment_negative: El desayuno,  pobre e incómodo,  no casa con el resto del hotel. No cambian € tampoco. Unicas pegas que le pongo,  por eso se lleva un 9 y no un 10.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
全体的にとてもお洒落。中庭の池に鯉がゆったり泳いでいます。ベッドのマットレスも快適。
朝食は毎日内容が変わり、味種類共に良い。現地の料理(ベトナム中部料理)もよく出てます。
スタッフはとても感じ良い。
周辺に殺風景な場所もありますが、コンビニもありレストランもたくさんあります。ビーチへも徒歩圏内。
review.comment_negative:
2Fの部屋に泊まりましたが、1Fのロビーや朝食会場の音が結構聞こえてきます。他に水の流れる音やホテル前の道の音が割と聞こえます。
ベッドサイドにテーブル等物を置く所があると良い。あとコンセントも。
シャワールームのシャンプーが置いてある棚が微妙に高い位置にある。
デザインを追及した造りな為か、実用性が置いて行かれた面がある。

review.comment_negative:
The rooms were nice, however, they lacked some basic functions like sockets near beds, hooks to hang the towels or space around the sink for the toiletries. We had to find creative ways to go about this. 
The idea of rooms facing inner courtyard is nice, however, once you are in the room, it feels a bit strange to be seen by others as well as being able to see other people in their rooms so we kept our curtain closed for the majority of time which means we didn't have much sunlight in the room.

review.rating: fantastic authentic and clean stay right in the centre of da nang.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: very authentic and clean. service was fantastic, highly recommend for a couple to stay.
review.comment_negative: bathroom area was smaller, but still manageable.

review.comment_positive:
Beautiful courtyard with koi pond in the middle, which was lovely if you intend to spend time at the hotel chilling. The beach (My Khe beach) was also relatively close, just 7 mins walk away but you will need to e-hail a car if you intend to visit the night markets. Breakfast was alright, but being a boutique hotel of just 24 rooms - decent enough but don't expect a huge spread.

They were very prompt with replies via e-mail and pro-active in offering help/confirming special requests, so kudos to the team there.
review.comment_negative:
There's only one tiny lift to service the building but since it's only 5 floors, guess you can walk up if the lift is full/busy. The room we stayed in (501) had its back facing the main road so you can definitely hear the noise levels, including loud music from the main street. The other room we had (506) wasn't cleaned so well (dust on the cupboards, some ants) but perhaps it was because we came at 1.45pm and the room wasn't quite ready yet and they had to rush it. 
The sink is small (literally no place to put anything on the table), likewise - there was no bedside table. Aesthetically very pleasing but not so practical.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

review.rating: Had comfortable stay, value for money,
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Staff, they were extremely helpful in every sense. Location was great, rooms were functional even if sightly small, walking distance from beach.

Such a beautiful and peaceful hotel, surrounded by a koi fish pond and green walls. only a few short minutes from the beach, and the rooftop pool is stunning for a dip. 

The Suite (room) was a perfect size, with a small kitchenette and beautiful decor. All the managing staff were super friendly, and always there to help with every question, to organise a motorbike, coffee orders and serve delicious breakfast every day! A wonderful stay in a quiet part of Da Nang.
review.comment_negative: I was there for remote working, so would suggest some additional wall sockets for charging and one near the bed. Only one (on the desk) provided is not enough.

Cozy rooms and lovely rooftop pool. If staying in Da Nang this is the place to stay! Thank you for a great stay!

review.rating: I wished I had stayed longer.
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: The property is beautifully built. A small building designed to feel relaxing and cozy. The koi pond in the middle is a main feature of its aesthetic. The location is on a small side street that makes it less busy and a nice respite from the buzzing city of da Nang. The room is spacious and very relaxing. A good place to relax after a long day of sightseeing. My favorite part of the stay was the service. Vicky at the reception was extremely welcoming and helpful. She was ready to answer any inquiry and help with looking for specific souvenirs and places that I wanted to find. Everyone else I met there (breakfast service and housekeeping) were friendly and helpful as well.

I had an exceptional stay at Minh Boutique. The staff was heart-warmingly welcoming and helpful. They went far and beyond to ensure I had everything I needed. I didn't have cash on the first night, so they took me to the ATM. Just one of the many gestures that amazed me. The facilities were spotless, clean, and stylish. The location was very convenient with lots of good restaurants and shops around. Because the hotel isn't situated by the main roads, it was quiet and I had a good rest throughout the stay. The breakfast was excellent with both Vietnamese and Western options that changed daily. I want to send special thanks to Emma, Vi, and Minh for a memorable stay <3. I'll stay at Minh Boutique again when I return back to Da Nang.

review.rating: Outstanding. Just book this hotel for a great stay in Da Nang!!!
review.comment_positive:
Everything was absolutely perfect. Outstanding. The staff was kind, polite, smiling and attentive, always ready to help. We had a welcome tea. The room was great, it's like a brand new studio-apartment with swimming pool at the top floor and view over the city. The breakfast was different everyday and just delicious. We had our laundry ready in one day, the next morning. We rented a scooter for 150 k/day.
But really, it's all about the staff and the way they handle this place. 300 % recommended!!!!!

review.rating: Ich würde jedem empfehlen, seinen Aufenthalt hier zu verbringen, wer in Da Nang ist. Absolut traumhaftes Hotel!
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Das ist das bisher schönste Hotel auf unserer Rundreise in Vietnam gewesen. Wir waren ein paar Hotels nebenan in einer Unterkunft, die uns gar nicht gefallen hat und dann sahen wir beim Vorbeigehen den Innenbereich mit dem Koy-Teich dieses Hotels. Leider war es komplett ausgebucht und nur ein Zimmer für 1 Nacht verfügbar, was wir trotzdem buchten. Das Frühstücksbuffet war sehr einladend, vielfältig und man konnte noch extra Eierspeisen auswählen. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und kümmert sich sofort um alle Belange. Der Rooftop-Pool ist der Hammer, die Aussicht gigantisch. 
Wir haben sogar kostenfrei einen Scooter für einen Tag bekommen, mit dem wir dann die Altstadt in Hoi An besuchten.
review.comment_negative: Bei unserem 1-tägigen Aufenthalt ist morgens das Wasser im ganzen Hotel ausgefallen aufgrund Probleme mit der Wasserpumpe. Wir wurden sofort per WhatsApp informiert und man hat sich entschuldigt. Das Problem war in ca. 25 min. behoben, daher war das gar nicht schlimm für uns. Wir haben sogar einen Getränke-Voucher als Entschuldigung bekommen. Das haben wir so in ganz Vietnam nicht erlebt, wie bemüht alle waren und sich dem Problem gleich annahmen. Außerordentlich toller Service👍

review.comment_positive:
"부띠끄" 호텔이라는 성격에 맞게 건축디자인이 뛰어나고 우드와 타일을 활용한 인테리어도 좋았어요. 좁은 공간에 ㄷ자 형태로 건물을 올리고 옥상에 수영장, 1층 중정에는 잉어 13마리(제가 헤아려본 바로는 ㅎㅎ)가 유유히 헤엄치는 연못이 있는데 이 모든 것들이 어우러져 진짜 공간의 미학을 느끼게 했어요. 1층 리셉션 옆 카페 천장엔 배가 두 척 매달려있는 것도 인상적이었구요.

한시장과 한강을 중심으로 한 중심관광지에선 조금 떨어져있지만, 충분히 걸어다닐 수 있고 반대편으론 미케해변이 가까와서 덜 번잡하고 여유를 느낄 수 있어요.

바나힐 왕복도 리셉션 스태프통해 그랩택시 기사 바로 불러주어서 흥정할 필요없이 70만동에, 기사랑 카톡추가해서 안전하게 연락하게 해준 덕에 편히 다녀왔어요.

공항픽업서비스도 아주 편하게 이용했구요.

The staff are superb, very helpful and friendly. The location is a 5 min walk to the beach and there are loads of local restaurants around. The breakfast was nice.

review.rating: fabulous small boutique hotel with friendly service

Excellent service, staff were exceptionally helpful and attentive. The hotel itself was very comfortable with a calming atmosphere. The breakfast was also wonderful.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_negative: The Minh Boutique Hotel Da Nang is an atrium-style hotel with a beautiful inner courtyard in which numerous koi swim. However, some rooms are quite noisy. We were therefore offered a move to a larger room at a lower price. But the room was actually smaller and the small discount was only granted for one night.

review.rating: Daher würden wir für unseren nächsten Besuch dieses Hotel nicht wählen und auch nicht weiterempfehlen können, was uns se
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Pro: Das Service Personal und die Managerin waren sehr sehr bemüht und haben auf Nachfrage unsere Anliegen schnellstmöglich erledigt. Wenn es sein musste , auch mehrmals während unseres Aufenthalts. Unsere kleine Tochter 4 Jahre wurde am ersten Tag krank. Sowas das wir die ersten Tage nur im Hotel verbrachten. Dank den Service Personal und der Frau Young mit der das kommunizieren über WhatsApp vereinfach wurde. Sie brachte uns essen für die Kleine außerhalb wo die Küche schon zu war. Brachte uns frisch gepresste Säfte aus dem Nachbars Restaurant. auch jeden Morgen fragte sie nach dem Zustand unserer Tochter. Hotel liegt in der Nähe vom Strand auf der Halbinsel Son Tra und bietet viele Restaurants. Ein Roller ist zu empfehlen. Klima im Zimmer funktioniert gut, dafür sehr laut. Pool auf dem Dach hat eine schöne Aussicht und das Wasser war warm.
review.comment_negative:
Contra: Da Nang Zentrum ist recht weit. Zimmer besitzen kein Balkon, die Sachen und Handtücher von Strand werden somit nicht trocken selbst nach einem Tag, da Zimmer sehr dunkel sind. Wir hatten wie andere Gäste auch dann unsere Sachen im Flur aufgehangen, jedoch waren diese Abends verschwunden und erst nach Nachfrage und Suche wieder aufgetaucht. Frühstück klein und wenig Auswahl bzw. Abwechslung, hat uns jedenfalls nicht ganz geschmeckt. Die Stromanlage befand sich auch direkt oben drüber und das Surren war sehr laut auch nachts. Es gab sogar einmal ein Stromausfall.
Warum wir es so niedrig bewerten liegt vor allem daran, dass selbst nach mehrmaligen austauschen, die Handtücher und Bettwäsche immer „dreckig“, Flecken drauf waren, oder super alt, zerrissen, teilweise zusammen genäht waren. Das ist absolut ein No Go und wir haben uns dadurch nicht wohl gefühlt. Das Hotel hat ein offenes Konzept, was super auf den Bilder aussieht, aber in der Realität unpraktisch ist. Denn überall sind Mücken und es ist nicht klimatisiert. Unser Zimmer lag auf dem 2. Stock und es war super laut. Bis spät in die nachts wurde gewerkelt oder Karaoke gesunken bei den Nachbarn, als würden wir direkt neben dran sitzen. Morgens früh wurden wir wach von den Frühstücksvorbereitungen und Geschirr Geklapper. Also super hellhörig.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.rating: One of the nicest places I’ve ever stayed!
review.comment_positive: The entire vibe was amazing. Very calm and serene environment, and the rooms were beautiful. Staff was also amazing, accommodating, and helpful for setting me up to do things around Da Nang. Location is also great! I’ll definitely stay here again.
Everything. Easily the best hotel I've stayed at in Vietnam. It was comfortable, clean and quiet. The staff are wonderful, friendly and attentive. Mun looked after me brilliantly during the stay.
review.comment_negative:
The location isn't great - the street around it will be something really special in a year or two but right now much of it is under construction. I had to rely on taxis to get to the more interesting parts of Da Nang.

It is very close to a lovely beach though!

review.rating: Tropische Oase mit allen Komfortstandards in bester Lage.
review.comment_positive:
Es war alles überaus angenehm, vom netten Personal, das zu jeder Uhrzeit alle Fragen beantwortete, bis hin zum Zimmer mit Blick in den idyllischen Innenhof/Garten. Das Frühstück hatte eine tolle Auswahl sowohl vietnamesischen Spezialitäten als auch europäische Klassiker. 
Die Unterkunft bietet alles was man benötigt wie bsp. eine Wäscherei, gratis Regenschirme, Rooftop Pool, Selbstversorger Utensilien auf dem Zimmer etc.
Wir können die Unterkunft jedem Empfehlen, es gab nichts auszusetzen.
review.comment_negative: alles war bestens

review.comment_positive: Arquitectura y decoración

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Struttura nuova,pulita e caratteristica, non un palazzone grigio di quelli che si vedono a Da Nang, con belle piante verdi ed uno splendido laghetto artificiale con pesci che rende tutto ancora più Zen.
In zona perfetta sia per il mare sia per la parte interna.
Il personale è eccellente, parlano tutti inglese,estremamente gentili e accoglienti.
L’albergo si trova a pochi passi da negozietti e ristoranti di ogni genere.
La mia camera era enorme, anche con angolo cottura, pulita.
La musica in filodiffusione una vera chicca.
Assolutamente da consigliare
Trải nghiệm chung là ổn, không có vấn đề gì lớn xảy ra trong kỳ nghỉ.
Bardzo miła i pomocna obsługa.
review.comment_negative: Trochę wkurzające oczko na patio, słychać je całą noc.

review.comment_positive:
La struttura è bellissima 
L piscina all ultimo piano è davvero fantastica 
La colazione è di qualità e ampia
review.comment_negative:
Forse siamo stati sfortunati 
La prima notte abbiamo dormito in una stanza con i motori dei condizionatori proprio dietro la nostra finestra ed era piuttosto rumorosa, inoltre durante la notte abbiamo ammazzato sembra come una blatta volante.
Così il secondo giorno ci hanno gentilmente cambiato la stanza…molto più grande e meno rumorosa ma c erano molte formiche all interno del letto.
Forse ci è andata male perché la struttura merita.

review.comment_positive:
En skøn lille perle vi havde fornøjelsen af i 2 nætter. Utrolig flot indrettet med masser af planter og lækre materialer. 
Personalet var så venligt - ud over det sædvanlige - og gjorde alt for at gøre vores ophold behageligt.
Lækker morgenmad hvor man også kunne ønske speciel mad.
Vi nød roen på hotellet samtidig med at der var gåafstand til strand og by.
Vi er et dansk par 50 plus . 
De bedste anbefalinger herfra.

We loved the inside-outside feel of the hotel, with the fish and greenery. The room was spacious and communal areas quiet and clean. The pool had a shallow end so our 4 year old could stand up as well as swim. The extra bed was set up alongside one side of the double bed which worked well. Staff were friendly and professional.
review.comment_negative: There was a lack shelves or hooks in the bathroom area. The shampoo wasn’t good at all and didn’t wash hair properly. There needs to be outlets for chargers and bedside shelves/tables as this made things inconvenient. The chairs in rooms and breakfast area need cushions on the bottom of the legs as they made a loud noise every time you moved them.

review.rating: Các bạn nhân viên siêu nhiệt tình và nhẹ nhàng. Cảm ơn rất nhiều vì được các bạn giúp đỡ trong chuyến du lịch

review.comment_positive:
첫인상은 너무 예뻣고 가격은 저렴했습니다.
무료조식이라 기대를 안했는데 깔끔하고 특히 쌀국수가 어디 식당에서 먹는것보다 훨씬 맛있었습니다.
직원들이 열정이 있고 매우 친절했습니다.
옥상에 수영장이 있어서 더울때 수영하기 좋았습니다
정말 가성비가 좋았고 호텔 바로앞에 먹쌈 이라는 한정식집이 있는데 거기도 맛있습니다.
도보이동가능한 주변에 씨푸드 레스토랑이 많습니다
정말 추천할만 합니다

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
建物が素敵。緑が多くて雰囲気がいい。
屋上のプールが小さいけどとても気持ちいい。
スタッフの人がみんな明るく親切。問い合わせ用のLINEで日本語がんばってくれた。
朝食がすごく美味しい。ベトナム料理が食べられて嬉しい。3泊したけど毎日違って飽きなかった。
歩いて外に出ることはあまりなかったけど、どの場所に行くにも遠くない。悪くない立地。
review.comment_negative: タオル類がにおうのと、どなたかも書いてますが隣の部屋の音は同じ部屋かな？くらい聞こえる。

review.comment_positive:
ホテルの人がとても親切でした。
次の日は別の部屋に移動でしたが、チェックイン前に部屋移動出来るように準備してくれました。
他にも色々教えてくれたり、みなさん笑顔で対応していただき、とても気持ちよく過ごせました。

ホテルも部屋もとても清潔感があり、中庭がとてもおしゃれでした。
review.comment_negative:
気になる程ではありませんが、ベッドの近くにコンセントがあれば良かった。

review.comment_positive: It has all the needed amenities with unique and beautiful interiors. The bed especially was extremely comfortable (in the studio room with garden view). The staff are very kind, always helpful and accomplishing with cups of ice tea at all times:)) Main personal during the day shift Mun and evening shift Vi especially went beyond their duties to make sure our stay was pleasant. Thank you guys for everything😊.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The room was clean and comfortable, and the staff were very welcoming
The room was spacious, and the staff were helpful. There was a lovely rooftop pool although we didn't use it and it was well situated.
review.comment_negative: The walls were not well sound proofed so the noise from the street (including terrible karaoke) was quite loud. Breakfast was fine, although no ability to toast the bread apart from an odd mini oven.

review.rating: A relaxing stay in Da Nang
review.comment_positive: The Minh Boutique was everything we were looking for: friendly staff, beautiful facilities, and a strategic location. The hotel serves a really good breakfast with both Western and local options. Lan, the member of staff who took care of us, was very kind and attentive to our requests. Staff at the reception were also extremely kind, arranging takeaway breakfast for us since we had to leave for the airport at 5 am! There was plenty of space, cleanliness, and tranquility in the room. It was a wonderful experience for my husband and me!
review.comment_negative: The airconditioning system could to be more powerful

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: We opted for the penthouse unit, and I must say it exceeded our expectations. The unit is incredibly pleasant, offering ample space, cleanliness, and an overall charming aesthetic. The staff members were exceptionally friendly and helpful, even providing us with great lunch recommendations. The breakfast offered was reasonably satisfying. What I truly appreciate about this boutique hotel is its serene/quiet atmosphere. Unlike larger hotels, there were no large groups crowding the dining area or the pool, allowing us to enjoy the space in peace. The pool was a delightful addition to our stay. I want to express my sincere gratitude to the staff for their exceptional service throughout our time here.  All we did the whole day was to spend our time in the room, have a drink inside watching the pool outside, so enjoyable.
review.comment_negative: I was quite surprised by the bathtub and shower in the accommodation. I must say that the shower system's heating capacity was insufficient for longer-term use. It took multiple cycles of water reheating for the bathtub to be filled up completely. Unfortunately, this significantly impacted the enjoyment of the bathtub as it took a considerable amount of time to fill.

The building is so green and lush with koi carps swimming in the pool. The room is nicely decorated with tiles and wooden beams, and there is also a great roof top pool to cool down after a long day. review.comment_positive: Everything. The staff are very kind and punctual. The hotel is clean and peaceful. The rooms are beautiful, as is the lobby area. The breakfast buffet is some of the best I've had in Vietnam, and they make additional delicious vegetarian food for you too if you need it (Vietnamese food). The location is also excellent: just a 10-15 min drive from the airport, only 3 min walk from My Khe beach, and just a 10-min drive to the dragon bridge.

The pool is amazing on the roof! We stayed 1 night. Very good bed, fast laundry service and staff. Can recommend this one! The staff helped us to book a motorbike tour and was very kind.

review.comment_positive:

朝食ビュッフェで提供されるベトナムフードは美味しく、さらにフォーまたは卵料理が選べるのも良かった。
屋上にはプールもあり、ホテルの規模の割には快適にくつろげるのも良かったです。
徒歩数分以内にいろいろなレストランやコンビニがあり、すごく便利なロケーションでした。
スタッフはフレンドリーで、皆さんのよく気が利く「おもてなし」もとても良かったです。

The perfect travel experience is impeccable in terms of price, service, beauty and transportation. Entering the hotel, you will feel like an urban jungle. It is very cost-effective.

The service attitude of the front desk is very good. It is very enthusiastic to help us solve a lot of problems.

The hotel includes a motorcycle rental service. The price is also very suitable. It is also very close to the beach. If you can ride a motorcycle, it is very convenient in both scenic spots and in the city.

The room is very clean and the breakfast is also very good. If you still have a chance to come to Da Nang, I will definitely stay again.

review.comment_positive: 我们在这里住了三晚，住的很开心，房间干净，早餐丰富，这里的工作人员也很友善，他们给我们推荐了附近的餐厅，我们连续吃了两天，非常棒的推荐！这个酒店有一项服务很贴心，他们会根据你的国籍推荐和你对接的工作人员，以便给你更好的帮助。和我们对接的是Phoebe，她会讲中文！我们中间遇到了一点问题，她很快想办法帮我们解决了，很感谢她！我对这里的印象很好！

review.comment_negative:
Zimmer sollten optimiert werden - teilweise wirklich sehr unpraktisch gemacht (z.B. Waschbecken & Toilette)
Sauberkeit verbesserungswürdig (z.B. Loch im Bettlaken, Flecken auf Kissen usw.). Solche Dinge sollten einfach vorab gesehen werden, ohne dass man darauf hinweisen muss. (Fällt einem selbst ja meistens erst beim Schlafengehen, sprich erst spät Abends auf - wo man dann auch nicht mehr das Bett ändern lassen möchte).

Bei Abreise wurde gefragt wie der Aufenthalt war - auf unsere Antwort, dass nicht alles perfekt war und was zu ändern wäre usw. kam die Antwort, dass wenn es uns nicht sehr gut gefallen habe wir lieber gar keine Bewertung abgeben sollten, ansonsten bitte eine 10. Ist uns leider bei vielen vietnamesischen Hotels so ergangen - was wir schlichtweg nicht richtig finden.

review.rating: Wunderschönes Hotel zum Abschalten und Runterkommen
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Klasse Hotel, in bester Gegend und super nettem und sympathischem Personal!

Die Innenarchitektur ist wie auf Bildern beschrieben und wirkt sehr beruhigend.

Die Zimmer sind sehr schön und das Personal auch sehr zuvorkommend!

Die Lage ist perfekt für Đà Nẵngs schönsten Ecken.

Kleiner Tipp:
leiht euch für ca. 6 Euro am Tag einen Motorroller mit Automatikgetriebe aus. Von dort aus kommt ihr innerhalb von maximal 20 Minuten zu der Affeninsel und den Marble Mountains. Außerdem seid ihr damit sehr flexibel unterwegs. War ein riesen Spaß.

Was wir auch empfehlen können, ist die Bar am Eingang. Die freundliche Dame ist auch die Hausköchin. Dort könnt ihr, neben dem Personal, Feedback und Esswünsche äußern, wie vegane Alternativen.

Probiert unbedingt die frisch selbst zubereiteten Fruchtsmoothies!

Falls es für euch weitergeht nach Huế, könnt ihr vom Hotel aus den Fahrer buchen. Dieser hat uns auf Wunsch über den Hải Vân Pass gefahren und für uns bei den Kaisergräbern in Huế gehalten und gewartet bis es wieder weiterging.

Liebe Grüße aus Berlin, wir kommen bald wieder!
Minh und Marie

review.comment_positive:
Super schickes Boutique Hotel mit Koi Teich im offenen Innenhof. Wir waren früher da, als die Check-In Zeit, konnten unser Gepäck sicher dort verstauen und haben Bescheid bekommen, sobald das Zimmer fertig ist, sodass wir in der Zeit eine Runde zum Strand gehen konnten. 
Sehr nettes und bemühtes Personal.
Zimmer war etwas besonderes und sehr schön, sauber und gut ausgestattet. Rooftop Pool mit schöner Aussicht. 
Lage in der Nähe des Strandes. Roller mieten am Hotel problemlos möglich, wir haben sogar einen etwas leistungsstärkeres Modell bekommen, als das Personal erfahren hat, dass wir zu den Ba Na Hills fahren - ohne Aufpreis. 
Als es abends zum Flughafen ging und wir auf unser Taxi gewartet haben, haben wir nochmal 2 Flaschen Wasser und Kekse für die Reise bekommen - riesiger Pluspunkt für die Aufmerksamkeit des Personals.
review.comment_negative: Leider war das Frühstück sehr unter dem Durchschnitt was Angebot, Auswahl und Qualität angeht. Schade eigentlich bei diesem sonst tollen Hotel.

review.rating: A beautiful and tranquil hotel with lovely helpful staff.
review.comment_positive: We were highly impressed with the Minh Boutique. The staff are very welcoming and helpful. It has a beautiful and tranquil central courtyard with a lovely Koi Pond. Our room was really lovely and exceeded our expectations. The rooftop terrace and pool is very nice, quiet and peaceful.
review.comment_negative: The rooftop terrace and pool is rather small with not much space to sit and relax, but we hadn’t planned on spending much time lounging so this was fine. We spent only two nights here and it was a little further from the busy popular areas than we would have liked so we had to get taxis or grab bikes to get around.

review.rating: A nice experience, Can be recommended.

review.rating: Exceptional stay in DA Nang ..Treated like ROYALTY !!!!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
The entire staff at thia place knows how to take care of its guests!!!!It was intimately cozy, close to the beach, and I was treated like royalty!!!±±Service was spectacular! Especially the two ladies at the front desk, Young and Min.

Thank you for a fantastic stay! I would definitely return and recommend.
review.comment_negative: Exceptional stay!

review.rating: Bel hôtel à deux pas de la plage.
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: La piscine sur le toit et la déco de la chambre.
review.comment_negative: Il n'y a que deux transats au bord de la piscine pour tout l'hôtel. Il manque des tables de chevet.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
接客が丁寧でした
こじんまりした雰囲気が良かったです

Had a wonderful stay at Minh Boutique! Service was top notch and the staff was very nice and accommodating. Super clean and comfortable rooms. Probably the most comfortable beds and pillows ever! The included breakfast was so yummy. I also loved the atmosphere of this hotel. The koi pond, greenery, etc were beautiful! Didn't get a chance to use the pool, but we checked it out and it looked great with a nice view. We only stayed here for one night before going to Hoi An, but I wished we stayed here longer! Will definitely stay at Minh Boutique again if we come back to Da Nang :)
review.comment_negative: Nothing! Everything was absolutely perfect.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Friendly and helpful staff. Clean room and decent breakfast.

The staff were EXTREMELY friendly and were sure to always greet us. They also offered us a welcome drink and crackers which was a nice gesture. The local staff helped us alot with what places to visit, stalls to shop from, restaurants to eat etc and always gave us good recommendations. The breakfast provided had a wide array of options and was excellent. The rooms were huge and had a very luxurious feel. We loved the feature of music playing in every room. The overall ambience and service in the hotel was exemplary. The beach was was also walking distance from the hotel.
Young and Vikki helped us a ton with recommendations and always sweetly greeted us
review.comment_negative: The area was somewhat secluded and to find restaurants at walking distance is difficult

review.comment_positive: Unglaublich schöne Details,tolles Design,sehr freundliches Personal,gute Küche
Tôi hài lòng với trải nghiệm của mình tại đây. Sẽ cân nhắc quay lại.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Klein und fein. Sehr liebevoll eingerichtet, die Angestellten sind super nett und hilfsbereit. Sehr herzliche Menschen. Die Köchin war sehr nett und kümmert sich gut um ihre Gäste. Wir haben am ersten Tag noch Kaffee und Gebäck offeriert bekommen. Der Service war gut. Manchmal fehlte ihnen das Auge für Details aber sie waren immer darum bemüht, die Gäste zufrieden zu stellen. Die Zimmer sind ordentlich und gut. Bei der Sauberkeit hat es aber noch Verbesserungspotenzial. Doch wir waren sehr zufrieden und können es gut weiterempfehlen.
review.comment_negative: Die Sauberkeit ist ok. Es war nicht schlecht aber könnte besser sein.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.rating: Great place for families who want adventure and convenience
review.comment_positive: Brilliant location and the staff are excellent, particularly Young, who was able to help organise trips for us!

review.rating: ONE OF THE BEST STAYS IN DA NANG, VIETNAM
review.comment_positive:
During our stay in Vietnam, we changed multiple hotels and B&B, but Minh Boutique stay was one of the best stays. We stayed in room number 404, which had a fantastic view from the window. This room is a studio apartment with an electric stove and smart tv so you can watch your favorite TV shows while cooking or having food. The staff was very polite and helpful. The most amazing thing was the Reception of the Minh Boutique.

Remember to rent a bike from Minh Boutique; they charge $6.5 USD ONLY.

10/10

review.rating: Relaxing with a wonderful ambience. Highly recommend people to stay at Minh Boutique.

review.rating: Hotel bonito pero la habitación con vistas al jardín es como estar dentro de un escaparate.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Todos los empleados muy atentos. El desayuno muy bueno. Limpio. Ubicación a 5 minutos de la playa. Tuvieron la amabilidad el último día al irnos antes del horario del desayuno de ofrecernos el desayuno. Es un hotel para ir pero a las habitaciones que no pongan “con vistas al jardín”
La cama muy cómoda, hemos dormido fenomenal y la ducha también muy cómoda, espaciosa y con el agua caliente
review.comment_negative: Elegí la habitación con vistas del jardín, lo que no sabía es que el frontal de la habitación, incluida la puerta era todo de cristal y daba al pasillo de las otras habitaciones, con lo que si yo veía el pasillo y las jardineras todos los que pasaban por el pasillo me veían a mí en la cama y si cerraba la cortina la habitación se quedaba a oscuras como si no tuviera ventana. En la habitación parecía que estabas en un escaparate de Zara. Las otras habitaciones eran mejores, por lo menos tenías intimidad. Además la cama no tenía mesillas y el interruptor de la luz estaba lejos, tenías que levantarte. Vi la habitación con vista al patio y era muy buena, si hubiera elegido esa habitación o el apartamento les daria una puntuación de 10

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

工作人員很友善, 也會介紹不錯的店家跟幫忙叫車, 房間環境也很舒服
review.comment_negative: 洗手台菜渣沒有清乾淨, 是很可惜的小細節

review.rating: Comfortable, a little oasis amongst faceless hotels with excellent value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Bathroom in the studio works really well, good water pressure and an excellent shower. Beds are comfortable, clean and nice environment. The dining area was lovely and the staff were great helping us with trips, where to eat and they solved a problem we had swiftly to a good outcome. Perfect for travelling across South East Asia
review.comment_negative: Pool area very dark and not well lit at night, we could have asked so maybe there was.

review.rating: Perfect place to stay in Da Nang.
review.comment_positive: The property was absolutely beautiful and such a relaxing environment. We had such a warm welcome and all the staff were so lovely and made our stay very comfortable. The room was beautiful and had everything we could need. The buffet breakfast was also incredible and everything felt like it was prepared with love. The location was also perfect just a short walk to the beach. We can’t wait to stay here again!!
review.comment_negative: Nothing, everything was perfect.

review.comment_positive: we absolutely loved this place. the service was outstanding ( thanks Phoebe) and the design is very mid-century and elegant. The swimming pool on the roof is glorious with great views.
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect!

review.rating: Cute boutique hotel with wonderful staff. Highly recommend.
review.comment_positive: Super cute, wonderful staff, nice rooftop pool, close to beach, good air con, nice breakfast with local specialties, restaurants nearby.
review.comment_negative: Little bit more room or shelving needed in shower area.

review.comment_positive: Mooie luxe kamer met uitzicht over de binnentuin, mooi zwembad, goed ontbijt, vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel, goede ligging vlak bij het strand.
review.comment_negative: Geen nachtkastjes en stopcontacten naast het bed, zeer krap toilet en wastafel.

review.rating: 完美滿足這裡的孩子都很良善討人喜歡
review.comment_positive: 服務人員超貼心的像朋友一樣噓寒問暖還會幫你提前預想到一些準備來這裡住這裡感覺真的很愉快心情特別得好
Toller Aufenthalt, sehr schöne Zimmer. Außergewöhnlich war vor allem die Freundlichkeit der Mitarbeiter
I liked the vibe, felt very relax, room was big, clean, breakfast was great, good staff.
review.comment_negative: nothing bad to report! everything was great.

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive:
This hotel design and decoration are absolutely gorgeous. There is great attention to details and the interior architecture looks really amazing !
The pool on the rooftop was so great, we used it everyday. 
Breakfast was also good.
Staff especially Phoebe was super helpful and arranged transportation for us. There is also laundry service.
review.comment_negative:
We stayed in the penthouse which was spacious and had a great direct access to the pool.
However, the AC was not working properly.
The staff gave us an extra fan but the room was still very hot most of the time.
The outdoor bathroom is a nice idea but I think should be closed off as it gets noisy with road traffic and again gets very hot !

review.comment_positive: Это самый лучший отель в котором я была. продумано все до мелочей, как будто застреваешь в ином мире. Спасибо вам за эту гармонию. Все администраторы отзывчивые и добродушные люди. Особенно Фиби. Я желаю этому отелю побольше клиентов и дальнейшего развития 🫶Я обязательно к вам вернусь!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
The property is so beautiful, so lush and green. The rooms are quite spacious and had all the facilities needed.
The property is very well located and so close to beach and clubs, restaurants. The breakfast was quite good and quite accommodative of the vegetarian requests.
review.comment_negative: The rooms are not that sound proof, could hear a lot of noise early mornings.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Sehr schönes kleines Boutique Hotel mit einem Mini-Pool. Leckeres Frühstück und entspannte Atmosphäre. Personal sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Super leckere Kokoskekse!

review.rating: Long was so helpful! Looking forward to coming back
review.comment_positive: Beautiful. Excellent staff.

review.rating: A dream place for a very good price value !
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved staying there and were quite sad to leave. 
The breakfast was amazing, the best we had so far in Vietnam, the room especially the bed was really confortable, the staff really nice and helpful, the pool and the view from the rooftop was a dream, all the attentions next to it (tea when we arrive and leave, the small cookies,…) and also the fact that it’s so close to the beach for some walks or a drink in the evening and everything for a very good price, I couldn’t dream better !
review.comment_negative: Absolutely nothing, everything was perfect

review.comment_positive: Восхитительно все. Особенно персонал.

review.rating: Great place to start the day and great place to end the day after many adventures in Da Nang.

review.comment_positive: Breakfast was excellent. Head cook did a very good job with the eggs and pho in the morning. Large selection of items to choose from and all offerings were fresh.
review.comment_negative: Lobby and eating area could have been air conditioned but I understand that it’s very much an American luxury not common in other parts of the world.

review.comment_positive: the interior & exterior is so beautiful, the breakfast delicious and the service is excellent and super friendly. we totally recommend this place!!

Sạch sẽ, không gian và service tuyệt vời. Đồ ăn sáng cô nhà bếp làm rất ngon. mọi người rất thân thiện. sẽ quay lại cùng gia đình và bạn bè nếu có dịp quay lại Đà Nẵng.

review.comment_positive: The staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. She recommended a lot of good locations like food, shopping, night market etc. Also helps to book the rides to attractions.

review.rating: super preisleistung und sehr ruhig obwohl es mitten in der Stadt liegt!

review.comment_positive: super gemütliches und schön eingerichtetes Hotel. sehr ruhig obwohl es im Zentrum lag. ich würde es immer wieder buchen.
review.comment_negative: wir hatten Motorroller gemietet. beide waren leer und wir mussten selbst erstmal tanken und eine Tankstelle finden. ein Roller war dann sogar nach zwei Tagen kaputt und wir mussten ihn mitten in der Stadt stehen lassen. das Hotel hat sich jedoch darum gekümmert.

review.comment_positive: Friendly and helpful staff. Good location. Nice atmosphere. Very diverse breakfast
review.comment_negative: No remarks.

review.comment_positive: One of the best accommodation during my Vietnam trip. Incredible nice staff, so kind and helpful. The hotel is such a nice and beautiful small boutique hotel. Very new and clean. Great facility. Beach access in walking distance. Restaurant and Café also. Motorbike rental is also possible.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng tuy không quá nhiều món, nhưng tập trung vào chất lượng từng món ăn, hợp khẩu vị

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: The staffs were really kind, approachable and surprisingly, they speak English really well. They always welcomed us with big smiles and the place is like home. It was clean and there's this small garden where you can just relax anytime you want. The place is near the beach and the 4 bridges. They also serve nice breakfast. Our stay there was memorable and i can highly recommend this place.
review.comment_negative: there's no conditioner in the bottle labeled "conditioner".

review.rating: Một nơi ở tuyệt vời. chắc chắn khi đến đà nẵng mình vẫn sẽ chọn Minh Boutique
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: khách sạn có không gian đẹp. nhân viên cực kỳ thân thiện, dễ mến trong tất cả những nơi mình đã đi qua. nếu ai lần đầu đến Đà Nẵng thì đây là nơi ở tốt nhất vì các ở đây cung cấp đủ các tiện ích và giá cả cực kỳ hợp lý.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: La décoration de l’hôtel est très jolie. Je recommande à 100% cet hôtel. Le personnel est très gentil. Je remercie Young qui nous a permis de vivre une belle expérience dans cet hôtel, elle est très gentille et serviable!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Small, unique, nostalgic
review.comment_negative: Glass door to toilet bowl was clashed with louvres, tap of washing basin was not long enough, towels not soft enough, glass of room door & wall facing corridor should be frosted to provide privacy without need to use the curtain

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel, very calm atmosphere ane beautiful roof with a swimming pool. Staff was super friendly and helpful and informed us that our nature bathroom could be very rainy when there is bad weather. They even offered that we could change the room as we check in because the weather was bad. The rooftop apartment was sooo beautiful and amazing! Loved it very much. They offer a very good private driver (perfect for a trip to Hoi An) with good prices for the service. They tried to make vegan breakfast on request (make sure to mention that eggs aren't vegan :) ). The effort was nice though. You can use the pool in the evening (all by yourself) if you book the rooftop room.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast buffet was a little bit small. Some mosquitoes up at the rooftop (room).

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.rating: A really nice place to be
review.comment_positive: Loved the koi carp pond! Staff were fantastic, especially Phoebe who made sure we always had what we needed. Really nice rooms. Generally a really nice place to be.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive: とても親切で、安心して過ごすことができました。また来たいです。ホテルの部屋もとてもきれいでした。

review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: Charming and relaxing hotel. The staff were really helpful and the beds were very comfortable. We had the penthouse room which had a fabulous outdoor bathroom and it was a treat to have the pool to ourselves in the evening. Great location too - very close to the beach.
review.comment_negative: A small thing that the hotel can't control - is the evening concerts on the beach being very loud. Just pack your earplugs!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: 조식 너무 맛있어요..너무너무 맛있어서 뷔페처럼 먹었네요 다음날 조식이 기대될지경! 바다, 시내 모두 20분정도 걸으면 돼서 딱히 택시 타지도 않았구요 방 정리도 깨끗하게 해주시고 수영장도 너무 예뻤어요!
review.comment_negative: 수영장 물이 너무 차가워서 오래 못놀았어요

review.rating: It was very comfortable for our one night stay in Da Nang. Great value for money as well.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The hotel’s conveniently located a short walk away from the beach. Breakfast was amazing.
review.comment_negative: The layout of the room was very unique. You can see into the room through a huge window. There are curtains, but it feels less secure because of that. Also, there are no sockets by the bed, but the staff shared that it was part of the design intent.

review.rating: Definitely recommend good location price and great service
review.comment_positive: Thoroughly enjoyed our time at the Minh Boutique good location one street from the beach room very comfortable staff excellent very knowledgeable and caring helped book tour and my husband was a bit sick one day and they brought him some ginger tea which helped settle his stomach would definitely stay here again

review.rating: view khách sạn tuyệt đẹp, các bạn nữ phục vụ lễ tân cực thân thiện. sẽ quày lại đây khi có dịp.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Tolle Lage, nahe am Meer. Sehr schöne Atmosphäre im Inneren, wollte nicht einmal das Hotel verlassen. Wunderschön eingerichtete Zimmer. Leckeres Frühstück, jeden Tag neue Gerichte. Höfliches und freundliches Personal.

Это лучшая гостиница, в которой я останавливалась за время моего пребывания во Вьетнаме (а я сменила 7 мест проживания). Больше всего понравился персонал - на все вопросы, которые у меня возникали, Май моментально давала ответы и рекомендации. Чувствовала себя как дома. Шикарный завтрак, очень красивые номера и лобби, потрясающий бассейн на крыше. Не задумываясь приеду сюда в следующий раз. Спасибо за все!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: スタッフが優しいので、素敵な時間を過ごさせていただきました。都会の喧騒を離れた静かな雰囲気を味わうことができて良かったです。

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Lovely atmosphere, so different from mainstream boring hotels.
Very comfortable beds.
Staff were very helpful with arrangements and answering questions etc.
A few minutes walk to beach and shops, great location.
review.comment_negative: Breakfast could be improved but trivial compared to everything else.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel with the best staff ever
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Minh Boutique is one of the best hotels I have ever been to! The place and the rooms are very nice and comfortable and the breakfast is amazing. The staff is so kind and helpful! My boyfriend was stuck at Lao border and the hotel staff organised  a transfer :). We are so thankful and happy. Whenever I am back in Da Nang, I would always choose Minh Boutique <3

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

review.comment_positive:
staff were fantastic and very friendly.
breakfast was great with all fresh foods.
the bed was amazing- one of the best sleeps I have had in my travels.

review.rating: Thanks for the good restaurant suggested by the staff, Phoebe :) Can tell she’s really hard working and trying to speak
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with tropical vibe!

Fantastic place to stop and relax for a couple nights. The staff are kind and helpful (especially Vi - Minh at reception) and there is a lovely koi pond right in the middle where breakfast is also served. I would definitely come back here

review.rating: 飯店內四處都是綠園植物讓有人置身森林的感覺，完全達到渡假放鬆的目的。再加上飯店工作人員貼心親切的服務，堪稱完美，我和家人朋友都相當喜歡這，
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
早餐非常豐盛，每天都會更換菜色，連住三天每一天早餐都有所變化。
飯店離美孚沙灘很近，帶著小朋友往沙灘走就可以玩個一個上午。最棒的是頂樓的無邊際游池，視野很寬廣。
review.comment_negative: 無。

review.rating: We didn’t like DaNang as a destination but the hotel was superb and we would go back.
review.comment_positive:
It was beautifully presented and offered a tranquil setting in the busy city. Near the beaches and the city. 
The staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful at all times.
review.comment_negative: The neighbouring properties weren’t as nice.

review.rating: Tolles Hotel, super Personal und gute Lage!
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft ist super gelegen, man kommt schnell an den Strand und hat viele Gelegenheiten für Essen, Massagen und Aktivitäten in der fußläufigen Umgebung und trotzdem ist es ruhig und man schläft entspannt. Das Personal ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit, wenn es um Wäsche-Service oder Shuttle Fahrten geht. Sie haben uns immer geholfen und gute Tips gegeben. Das Zimmer wurde jeden Tag, schon während wir beim Frühstück waren, gereinigt. Wir würden das Hotel auf jeden Fall wieder buchen.
review.comment_negative: Ein kleiner Minuspunkt ist das Frühstück. Dafür, dass es in Vietnam so viele verschiedene Früchte gibt, ist die Auswahl relativ klein. Beim Frühstück waren die Mitarbeitenden manchmal nicht besonders aufmerksam, wenn zB etwas leer war oder bei den Getränken am Buffet alles nass war. Das ist aber meckern auf hohem Niveau ;)

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

review.comment_positive: Tolles Frühstück, perfekte Lage, nachts sehr ruhig und bequeme Betten, sehr freundliches Personal. Besser geht's nicht.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
I loved this stay with my 3 year old boy. Helped the fish and the staff gave him food to feed them. 
Phoebe really made it for us. At breakfast, she took my little boy to feed the fish while I ate in peace! Travelling solo with my boy, I don't get many breaks so I really appreciate this! I needed to buy some luggage and she offered to come with me to buy it even though her shift was finished. The room was comfy. Good selection for breakfast.
review.comment_negative: Some small things, no hooks to hang things in the room to dry Swimwear etc.

review.rating: best hotel Iv stayed in in Vietnam

review.comment_positive:
Ein superschönes kleines Hotel. Sehr interessant gebaut. Sehr ruhig. Das Personal war überaus freundlich. Das Frühstück ließ keine Wünsche offen
 Jederzeit wieder

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: địa điểm tốt, không gian tốt

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel hat eine schöne läge in der nähe vom Strand, zu Fuss 10 geh Minuten entfernt. Auf dem Dach des Hotels ein wunderschöner Pool mit Ausblick über die ganze Stadt. Die Zimmer sind sehr cool eingerichtet und sehr Sauber, wir haben uns unheimlich wohl gefühlt, wären gerne noch ein paar Nächte länger dort geblieben. Das Frühstück war sehr lecker und das Personal sehr freundlich und Hilfsbereit.
review.comment_negative: Nichts

review.comment_negative: Nulla, era tutto perfetto

review.comment_negative: Bikes were a bit old and small but hey, they were free so what more could I want?

review.rating: the staff that makes the difference

review.comment_positive: the staff approachable and friendly.
review.comment_negative: with the price u don’t expect a Ritz Carlton room

review.comment_positive: La décoration, la piscine en rooftop et le petit déjeuner
review.comment_negative: La chambre avait une porte communiquante avec la chambre voisine. Même si elle était fermée nous entendions nos voisins.

review.comment_positive: The staff are incredibly kind, they will go out of their way to help you with anything and make your stay enjoyable. The rooms are very well thought out and comfortable. The breakfast is great and the pool is dreamy. We actually extended our stay to 7 nights because of how much we loved it! We couldn't have asked for more and will definitely be returning here!

review.comment_positive: 조용하고 청결하고 조식도 맛있습니다
review.comment_negative: 수영장이 조금 작아서 한팀이 먼저 사용하고 있으면 이용이 어렵습니다, 시간제한을 둔 예약제 같은건 어떨까요~

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ gọn gàng, đầy đủ tiện nghi cần thiết. View ở sảnh đẹp, nhiều cây cối, sống ảo thì hết bài. Bữa ăn sáng kèm đồ uống rất tuyệt vời. Check out xong còn được các bạn nhân viên phục vụ trà và bánh. Chắc chắn sẽ quay lại vào dịp gần nhất

Wunderschönes Hotel mit sehr leckerem Frühstück.

Kann das Hotel nur empfehlen.

Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Staffs were extremely friendly! Room fashion design! breakfast was delicious! everything was very good with our group.
review.comment_negative: Nothing yet!

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: 부모님 동생부부와 아기 동생 장모님 그리고 저까지 5박6일동안 너무나 만족하며 지냈습니다 시설도 훌륭했지만 무엇보다 스태프 모두가 친절하고 프로페션한 자세와 마인드를 가지고 저희를 대했기에 너무 흡족하고 좋은 기억을 가지고 떠납니다.
review.comment_negative: 없습니다.

review.comment_positive: It was clean and the staff were very attentive and friendly. The best hotel we’ve stayed at in Vietnam so far.
review.comment_negative: Everything was amazing.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
가격대비 완벽합니다! 첫 베트남 여행인데 환대받는 기분이 들었어요. 이국적인 느낌으로 꾸며져 있어서 정말 예뻐요. 사진보다 더 예뻐요. 직원들이 진짜 친절합니다👍. 방도 깔끔하고, 에어컨도 잘 나와요. 루프탑 수영장이 잘되어 있어요. 조식은 국수/ 계란&빵 단품으로 선택할 수 있고 음료도 주문 가능합니다. 어쩌다보니 두개를 다 먹게 되었는데 맛있었어요. 공항픽업 서비스 신청 했는데 친절한 기사님이 기다리고 계셨어요. 가격도 $7달러로 저렴했어요! 다시 다낭에 간다면 꼭 갈거에요! 직원들께 감사합니다. 덕분에 여행을 기분좋게 시작할 수 있었어요! Xin cám ơn❤️

Perfect for the price!  It was my first trip to Vietnam and I felt welcomed.  It is decorated with an exotic feel and is really pretty.  It's prettier than the picture.  The staff are really friendly👍.  The room is clean and the air conditioning works well.  The rooftop pool is great.  For breakfast, you can choose noodles/eggs and bread and you can also order drinks.  Somehow, I ate both, and it was delicious.  I applied for airport pickup service, and a friendly driver was waiting for me.  It was also cheap at $7!  If I go to Da Nang again, I will definitely go there!  Thank you to the staff.  Thanks to you, I was able to start my trip in a good mood!

review.rating: Ideal Vietnamese boutique hotel which is great value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful design. Lovely staff. 
A short walk to the beach but still a good location. Small but nice breakfast.

the staff was wonderful. they treated us with so much care and compassion. I would definitely recommend staying here if you’re looking for a quiet location with an amazing staff.
review.comment_negative: n/a

review.comment_positive: Todo maravilhoso
review.comment_negative: Nada a apontar de negativo

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive:
Hôtel absolument original de par son architecture. Ultra moderne, de conception tellement originale ( les chambres sont ouvertes sur un patio intérieur). Décoration magnifique. Belle piscine sur le toit.
Bien placé , près de la plage (10 mn à pied), près de Lady Buddah comme du pont du dragon (10 mn en taxi).
De taille humaine au milieu des gratte-ciels. Accueil agréable et prévenant. Petit déjeuner copieux, très bon, à côté des carpes !
review.comment_negative:
Il nous a manqué des tables de nuit.
Peu de rangement (ou de quoi accrocher ses affaires) dans la salle de bain.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Decoración increíble. Ambiente súper natural.  Desayuno variado y saludable. El personal fue atento y siempre se preocupó de que nuestra estancia fuera de lo más agradable posible.
review.comment_negative: Todo estuvo bien

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive: L'hôtel est à deux pas de la plage, entouré de très bons restaurants. Le personnel est adorable, souriant et serviable. Mun s'est montrée efficace, et a répondu à tous nos besoins et envies. Je recommande ce petit coin de paradis qui nous a enchanté.

review.comment_positive: Het hotel is terecht een boutique hotel. Er is veel aandacht voor detail, de binnenplaats wordt overwoekerd door prachtige beplanting het lijkt op een tropische jungle. Met een prachtige vijfer. Het ontbijt is top klasse en zeer uitgebreid. De kamers zijn zeer smaakvol ingericht beetje Balinees of Thai style met veel hout. Maar bovenal het personeel is supervriendelijk. We herkennen ons in onze bed and breakfast in Hoi An. Top we komen zeker terug en zullen onze klanten zeker doorverwijzen.

The girls at reception were amazing. They were helpful and attentive to us and our little one. They even allowed her to feed the fish and once they realised how much our little one loved the coconut biscuits, they always provided her with some.

review.comment_positive: Lovely ambience.  Very helpful and spritely staff! The front desk girl (didn't get her name) speaks fairly good English and was always quick to assist. Breakfast was good too.
review.comment_negative: I wouldn't say i disliked anything in particular. As a suggestion to improve the rooms though, some small tea tables next to the bed would be nice. And more power sockets for charging electronics as well. The lights inside the pool should also be turned on at night
