I like the room its very spacious and the ambiance of the hotel as a whole hits different. I feel like Im home. I like that they dont use bright lights and it makes every night relaxing. Also the staff, specially Ms Vi is very accomodating and always check on you through whatsapp.
review.comment_negative: None.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

review.comment_positive: Klimatyczny i kameralny  hotel z basenikiem na dachu i co stanowi największy skarb ze wspaniałym personelem, pomogą we wszystkim od rekomendacji po wypożyczenie skutera. Pokoje przestronne, jasne i czyste. Wygodne łóżko. W budynku widna i zjawiskowe patio. Polecamy gorąco pobyt pomimo braku widoku oceanu z okna. Wszystkie inne aspekty rekompensuje to w 200%

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi
review.comment_positive: We had the penthouse. It was a comfortable room and good access to the pool. Staff (mostly dealt with Lena) were very attentive. We also used the Hoi An return transfer - our driver was lovely.
review.comment_negative: On Monday evening there was very loud music til the early hours but that is not the fault of the hotel

review.rating: I will use the hotel again!
review.comment_positive:
All services are really good, especially the staffs are great!
The location and wifi speed is pretty good!
review.comment_negative:
Two points
1) Some pillows were smelled damp a bit, like half dried. Three pillows out of 4, we did not use because of the smell.
2) Bugs: It'd be better to cover some big dishes of the breakfast because some small bugs were getting inside. However, the meaning of bugs getting in is the meals did not contain a chemical stuff, so we liked that!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The ambiance is simply breathtaking, coupled with an ideal location that offers a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The staff are always warm and welcoming with their ever-present smiles, making us feel at home. And let's not forget the pricing, which is just right for the value and quality of service provided.

The beds and pillows were very comfortable. It was literally the best beds we've ever slept on. 

The staff was very friendly and accommodating. Our flight was delayed, and they offered to make us sandwiches for our arrival.  

The pond at reception was super relaxing and the rooms lovely.
review.comment_negative:
The staff should not allow children to play the piano as it is in the breakfast area, and it's very noisy. 

There were no bedside tables by the beds which could be a nice add up.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: beautiful design, especially the fish pond, and good breakfast, close to the beach
review.comment_negative: design on the room isn’t practical, there’s no space to put anything in the bathroom or next to the bed. it’s really beautiful, but some of the design is unpractical

review.comment_positive: We like the design and the ambience.  The staff are great and doing everything to help and making us feel welcome and comfortable. Great individual breakfast.
review.comment_negative: No complaints.  All good and satisfied.

review.comment_positive:
직원분들이 일단 너무 친절합니다. 
공항에서 환전안하고 바로 가서 현금이 없었는데
선뜻 택시비를 빌려주시고 환율 좋은 금은방도
알려주셨습니다. 

숙소가 너무 이쁩니다. 아침에 일어날 때마다
베트남에 온 기분을 물씬 느낄수 있어요.
내부에 정원을 키우는데 큰창문으로 보이는 라탄
인테리어, 초록 식물들이 보여서 행복했습니다.

내부에 작은 부엌(싱크대, 인덕션, 조리기구)
있습니다. 간단히 요리해먹기도 넘 좋았습니다.
침구가 진짜 너무 좋아요…이틀 잤는데 머리만
대면 기절했어요.

아침식사는 이틀 먹었는데 약간의 변화가 있지만
큰 변화는 없습니다. 저랑 엄마는 만족하면서
먹었어요.

수영장은 아담한데 식물로 인테리어를 잘해놔서 
이쁘고 물이 깨끗하게 관리되어 좋습니다.

위치는 사실 너무 좋습니다
한시장과 가깝고, 주변에 평이좋은 식당 및
유명 스파들이 걸어서 이동가능한 위치에 있어서
쇼핑하고 마사지를 좋아하는 분이라면 더할나위
없는 위치라고 생각합니다

review.rating: Really beautiful hotel, requires some slight improvements
review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The staff were so lovely, the room was beautiful and the facilities were great, including a rooftop pool with wonderful views of the city. Check in was quick and easy and Mun provided us with recommendations for tours of Da Nang 😊
review.comment_negative:
Our room was directly under the swimming pool and we could hear loud banging from people using the rooftop pool above us. We weren't made aware of this at check in and so this was very disappointing. They did give us free orange juices to the room to apologise in fairness to them.

Also, we booked a room with a "garden view" which should overlook the courtyard in the middle of the hotel, however you need to go out into the communal hallway to view this.

review.rating: Lovely boutique hotel for a comfortable stay.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The hotel has a very nice vibe. There is a beautiful Koi fish pond in reception. The breakfast was nice although simple yet filling. The room is cute and large range of TV channel options which was nice for evening. Rooftop pool is nice but not enough places to sit. The room is nice and comfortable but some design flaws (such as the blinds block the bathroom door from opening properly).
review.comment_negative: The reception was friendly and helpful but perhaps a bit invasive. They regularly sent whats app messages to ask if I needed recommendation. Although some might appreciate this, if I need recommendations, I will ask myself at the reception desk. I would advise reception to avoid this approach or at least ask customers if they would like to have this service when they arrive. For me, I found it a bit much as I had already done my research. I also feel that asking for a 10 star review from customers (which we experienced a lot in Vietnam) is not a great approach. Rather, simply ask customers to review their experience. Getting honest feedback is how we continually get better.

review.comment_positive: What a fantastic hotel!! We were only going to stay 1 night, but we found this gorgeous looking hotel (and very affordable) so decided to stay 2 nights. We were so happy with our decision. Young at reception was soooooooo helpful. She went above and beyond with anything we needed and provided us with so many recommendations dependent on what kind of thing we were feeling like doing. All the staff were just lovely. It’s a short walk to the beach which is stunning, and we loved our visit to Marble Mountains.  The hotel itself feels so tranquil and the pool was an absolute saviour after a morning/afternoon of activities. I recommend staying here if you want somewhere close to the beach.
review.comment_negative: Nothing - we loved everything.

review.rating: Disappointed that the reality didn't live up to expectations based on the positive reviews.
review.comment_positive:
Good location, easy to walk to the beach with lots of mini marts, pharmacies, cafes and restaurants around. 
Service is nice. Appreciated that reception makes an effort to help sort out activities and restaurant bookings. And they offered a free shuttle ride to Hoi An as compensation when we expressed our disappointment with the stay (because they asked). That was a thoughtful gesture that we appreciated. 
Great water pressure in the shower. 
wifi is good.
review.comment_negative:
Upon pulling up to the hotel, it looks very dark with hardly anything being lit up. 
The hotel itself and the rooms felt a lot smaller and darker in person than they look online. 
Really disappointed with the functionality of the rooms. Surprised the reviews don't mention this more. No bedside tables, no bedside lights, nowhere to hang clothes or place things in the bathroom (slanted, miniscule counter space), no luggage racks available, toilet cubicle is extremely tight, steps to navigate in a dark room, a few unusable bamboo hangers in the closet, water drains slowly in the sinks, tv remote didn't work...to give you a sense. 
Though it looked surface clean we never really felt relaxed there. Didn't like seeing housekeeping rinsing out the floor mop in our bathroom sink. 
Breakfast was pretty bad with few choices of pretty low quality if you're used to hotel buffets. 
The pool was closed 2 out of 3 afternoons that we were there due to maintenance/cleaning?

review.rating: Fully recommend for a relaxing stay.
review.comment_positive:
I don’t normally write reviews but I feel like I have to for Minh Boutique. 

I stayed here for the solo portion of my travels through Vietnam. Due to weather conditions, I knew I’d be spending more time in room than normal, so this was a bit of a luxury booking. 

I had arrived early for check-in after a 16 hour sleeper bus from Hanoi and was drenched from the hour walk from where the bus stopped. Seeing this, the staff very kindly made my room available to me right away, even though I was early - this was greatly appreciated. I was guided to a lovely studio room with a TV, kitchenette (one hob - enough for pasta or eggs, etc.) and lots of other nice features.

I did have an issue the first night, there was a loud and constant sound similar to a telephone ringing from somewhere outside through my closed back window, (I suspected from the kitchens below) and so I struggled to sleep (even though I’d been up for the last 40 hours). I will admit I do suffer from misophonia, but I do think this would have affected anyone, so I decided to complain (which I rarely do). The staff were incredibly apologetic (even though it wasn’t really their fault) and extremely accommodating, and moved me to a new room on the other side, for which I was again very grateful.

Overall I had a perfect stay. There is a K-Mart on the opposite side of the block, with everything you could need, and a mall about 30 min walk away if you need other more specific items. The rooms are very clean and relaxing. The breakfast is great, sort of a Vietnamese continental, with different specials offered each day. The laundry service is also fantastic. But above all, the lovely staff were who really made my stay so worry free. 

Thank you Minh Boutique.

review.rating: Excellent stay for those who loved boutique hotels.
review.comment_positive:
We like the design aesthetic of the hotel which gives a very authentic local vibes. The garden view studio has a nice pair of lounge chairs with a small coffee table facing the outside garden.
We also loved the indoor koi fish pond which was full of giant koi fishes swimming around.
Staff service is excellent and helpful. 
Location is good as it’s not located by the main road which can be noisy but it’s just right behind the main road and is walking distance to the beach. 
The breakfast is pretty decent and has everything for a wholesome breakfast.
review.comment_negative: The wooden blinds in the bathroom was difficult to operate. The toiletries provided - shower cream, shampoo & conditioner could be better. The rattan interior also needs some fixing as the cabinet doors with rattan was damaged when we checked in.

review.comment_positive: Hand down the best place I've ever stayed in Danang. The room is spacious and smells really nice. AC and music were ready upon entering and the staff are super friendly and helpful. The location is also nice since it is close to pretty much everything, the airport, the city center, and the beach. A bunch of restaurants, pubs, and convenience stores are close by. I got lazy and didn't go check out the rooftop pool but apparently, it seems nice. Also, the complimentary buffet breakfast exceeded my expectation as well, it was pretty nice.
review.comment_negative: I booked a 90-minute in-room massage and didn't enjoy it that much. The massage itself was like 4-5/10. The lady complained about how she only received a lot less than how much the hotel was charging and demanded a tip at the end tho I told her that I'd add that to the total payment with the hotel. Not really the hotel's fault since it's like an outsourced/collaborative service but yeah :) I'd recommend going to the actual spa and saving yourself some headache but maybe I was just unlucky and met that one particular massage lady.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Un hotel très agréable et reposant avec un personnel très accueillant et serviable.
Nous recommandons fortement :)

Visually spectacular- in quiet street but close to the beach and plenty of food options. Friendly and knowledgeable staff who are great at giving local options for food and activities. Rooftop pool is great.

review.room_type: Phòng Có Giường Cỡ Queen Nhìn Ra Vườn

review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten einen sehr besonderen Aufenthalt in diesem liebenswerten Boutique Hotel.
Wir haben noch lange am kleinen Koi Teich gesessen und richtig toll entspannt.

Das Zimmer war sauber und sehr schön eingerichtet und das Frühstück lecker und abwechslungsreich.

Das Bett war außerordentlich bequem und bescherte uns eine fantastische Nacht.

Besonders hervorheben möchten wir das Personal, das uns beim Buchen von Ausflügen und Taxis zuvorkommend beraten und unterstützt hat und immer ein Lächeln im Gesicht hatte. 

11/10

During checkout, they asked for our honest feedback without any pressure to write a review, although I'm still doing so! Plus, the rooms and overall atmosphere of this accommodation are delightful. I would definitely recommend it!

review.rating: Best Hotel during our stay in vietnam
review.comment_positive: Beautiful Hotel, extremely comfy beds, great location. Truly the best place we have stayed in vietnam, probably generally. Definitely recommend 👌
review.comment_negative: Our room was on the top floor and we could slightly hear the water pipes/pump when any water was being used in the hotel. Not loud, but enough to be noticed. Maybe a bit of insolation on the ceiling would get rid of it. DEFINITELY NOT A DEALBREAKER THOUGH. Still loved it

review.rating: Disappointing... I cut my stay short
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The hotel is easy to find and has a stunning little oasis in the centre of it. The design of the rooms is good (apart from the open-panelled ceiling which means you can see the pipes and cobwebs overhead). The bed was very comfortable and the shower was strong. It was very clean. The staff gave me a lovely welcome tea and helped take my bag to the room. The view from the roof is really nice. The beaches nearby are great. The staff did listen to my feedback and offered to pay for my taxi when I left as compensation which was appreciated.
review.comment_negative: There are several reasons why I wouldn't stay here again. The room had no toilet paper when I entered and dead TV remote batteries. The bidet tap was leaking. I was woken by the smell of cigarette smoke entering my non-smoking room (I think via the air conditioning?) which was really unpleasant. The breakfast was small and basic and towards the end of service it was messy and unappetising. The breakfast staff were on their phones so there was no welcome or explanation of how to order egg dishes or where to find cutlery. I'm not super keen on birds in cages (2x in the jungley courtyard), while its a traditional hobby I found it quite sad. The pool and surrounding area is extremely small so really better for a quick dip rather than spending longer amounts of time there. There were only 2 bicycles to rent so unfortunately they weren't available. The location was ok but after exploring I found the area around My An much more vibrant and interesting. When the quality of so many hotels in Vietnam is so high this was a real disappointment. I cut my stay short and moved on.

review.comment_positive: The staff at Minh boutique are exceptional! Very Friendly and very helpful. As this was our first time in Da Nang the staff recommended a lot of places to try in the area and also gave us options as we was leaving to our next location.  The hotel is beautiful and was kept very tidy during our stay. Breakfast was really nice with a wide selection of Vietnamese and Western food. Really cannot praise this hotel enough. Would highly recommend it to anyone staying in Da Nang!
review.comment_negative: There wasn’t anything bad about the hotel

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: La struttura é accogliente. La piscina sul tetto é spettacolare e poco frequentata quindi risulta molto tranquilla. La musica in filodiffusione anche in camera rende tutto rilassante. La colazione é varia e comprende sia proposte salate che dolci. Lo staff é molto gentile e sempre disponibile ad aiutarti. Abbiamo fatto due tour organizzati dalla struttura e i prezzi sono in linea con quelli proposti all'esterno
review.comment_negative: Tutto molto bello

review.rating: Great location, good value for money.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Great location for walking to the beach and lots of restaurants nearby. Friendly and helpful staff always happy to book taxis, take breakfast requests, provide laundry service.
review.comment_negative: Only one working sun lounger round the pool, however no one was ever at the pool so this was fine for us.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in great location without the crowds
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Such a lovely, well designed hotel. Definitely preferred staying in a place that feels small and personal to the giant hotel complexes all around town. It’s so close to the beach but in a quiet side street. The building is beautiful and the rooms really comfy and clean. Everyone working here was very nice and helpful.
review.comment_negative: The coffee at breakfast was really bad and cold at times. That really influenced how we felt about breakfast in the mornings

review.rating: Handy location to beach and short distance to Da Nang city
review.comment_positive: The location is great and walkable to the beach and many restaurants. We ended up staying in 2 different rooms as the air con was dripping when we arrived and we were upgraded to the penthouse by the pool for 2 nights then 3. Staff are friendly and Long was very helpful with getting me onto Grab and suggesting some restaurants. The central foyer area and restaurant provides a peaceful place to wait and eat breakfast. The large koi swimming add to the property. We were able to take the pool towels to the beach which is a short walk away and the hotel pool on the roof area is great. This is a mid size modern place in an area with many other hotels.
review.comment_negative:
The breakfast was ok however having stayed elsewhere we have had better.  
There is a lot of building in this area of Da Nang and the high rise apartments will change the feel to a more touristy beach location.

review.rating: Le Minh boutique est un endroit à ne pas manqué
review.comment_positive:
Le petit déjeuner est excellent et offre en choix variés 
Le lieu est paradisiaque et bien situé près des plages et restaurant
It was very relaxed and our host Phoebe was brilliant
review.comment_negative: Nothing

Overall, it seemed a bit expensive compare to other places we stayed at in Vietnam in terms of the 'value' provided - perhaps it is just that we had very high expectations based on the other guests reviews. It is a great place to stay but not as amazing as we thought it would be :)

review.rating: excellent place to stay, I would have loved to stay more days

Taxi/Trips are available at a very reasonable price and are easy to organise. The pool is a really nice added bonus and a welcome relief from the heat after a day sightseeing!

review.comment_positive: Nice design, friendly staff
review.comment_negative:
Not worth the high price at all.
The room is not soundproofed which made our stay really uncomfortable, we could hear quite clearly the talking/stepping sound from the lobby as well as the karaoke voice from the nearby neighbours. There were a few of small insects in the room, luckily they were not mosquito though.
The breakfast was not heated, most of the dishes were cold and choice-limited.
The most terrible issue was, the hotel has a centralized shower water heating system which means the hot shower water amount would be shared by all the rooms and you could suddenly run out of hot water while showering during peak hours which we encountered twice.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Beautiful design, layout and attention to detail in the rooms and around the hotel. Amazing breakfast in a lovely relaxing setting. Wonderful girls on reception who were always so kind and helpful :)

Einfach alles. Das Personal war unglaublich nett, freundlich und hilfsbereit. Als mein Mann sich auf dem Weg zum ATM verlaufen hatte, ist gleich eine mit dem Roller los um ihn abzuholen. Für meine Mutter gab es einen Geburtstagskuchen zum Frühstück geschenkt ❤️ die Zimmer sind schön eingerichtet und sauber. Frühstück war super. Es ist ein seltenes herzliches Hotel inmitten der ganzen hochgezogenen Hotels. Der Strand ist in 5 min zu gutzuheißen erreichen. Es gibt zwar auch Hotels welche direkt am Strand sind, aber die paar Minuten laufen sind es definitiv wert!!

review.rating: A delightful experience for our first visit to Vietnam. Lovely hotel, lovely people, and lovely food
review.comment_positive: The daily breakfast had a small but interesting spread of local dishes. You can also place an order for eggs (omelette, sunny side, etc) or noodles (which changes by the day). The hotel itself is located near to My Khe Beach and a host of eateries (less than 10 min walk). It is a quaint apartment with lots of greenery and a koi pond, nestled in an unsuspecting lane. The staff are exceptional and go out of the way to please, e.g., always asking if you need something, serving you tea and biscuits when you are waiting or seated downstairs. Most places of interest are accessible by Grab or you can book one of the many day tours through the hotel.
review.comment_negative: There were some issues with the water pressure as we were on the fifth floor but this was promptly attended to by the hotel's maintenance staff.

review.comment_positive: The bed was great
review.comment_negative: Bit small

review.rating: Relaxing, friendly and beautiful hotel in a convenient location!
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa
review.comment_positive: Very near to everything - 5min by taxi or walking. Staff was very accommodating and friendly. The hotel lobby is stunning just as in the photos. There is also a cafe service if you ask for a menu so I was able to do some work without going anywhere. We all really liked our stay and would come again :D
review.comment_negative: Breakfast could be better described to ensure safety for allergic and dietary restricted persons. I was bit disappointed with plastic water bottles while you claim to care highly about sustainability. Please change those to refillable glass bottles. It would also be great to be able to have a snack apart from breakfast - simple french fries would be a great help when stuck at the hotel during an evening storm. Pillows are too big and did not feel great for my neck but that's just my personal preference, other person may like it.

review.rating: I stayed not for long but I feel good. They also have a cute pool. Maybe they can setup a towel station then it will be

review.comment_positive:
- Incredibly good value for money
- staff are all very nice and accommodating and helpful
- easily rented a scooter from them for 150k/day. No fuss.
- room was nice and clean and the music that plays in your room (which you can switch on and off) is a very nice touch.
- few minutes walk to the beach
- very welcoming when you arrive
review.comment_negative:
- The pool is small with only two sunbeds but there was space for more. It kind of rendered the pool useless to us which was a shame.
- the breakfast was quite basic however it was automatically included so can't complain really. We tried it once but then decided to go out for breakfast the other days, but this wasn't a big deal at all.

review.comment_positive: great location, friendly staff, clean and comfortable room.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: The property was in a good location closer to the beach and at a reasonable rate. While the room size was comparatively small it was well maintained and dint feel cluttered. Phoebe was a wonderful host took care of our requests and advised us on places to visit. It would have been a cherry on the cake if they offered competitive prices for internal travel but that’s okay.
review.comment_negative: We had a small issue with the room I.e our door lock was broken and we had to use physical keys to open and close it. The staff tried to fix it but they weren’t able to do so. They did offer us to move to another room but it was late and we did not want to do that as we were planning to check out the next day.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Everything! It was a wonderful stay and we totally recommend this place. Especially the staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast delicious and the architecture and design is stunning. Love it! :))

very beautifully made. the rooms are comfortable. clean. and the staff helpful if u approach them. they have traditional breakfast, meaning western style is very reduced to white toast and jam with eggs. buffet is nice, personally we prefer a la carte.
review.comment_negative: we booked a room for three people (2 adults, 1 child) but only had 2 towels. no pool towels. and a queen size bed.

review.rating: Beautiful setting. Amazing seafood restaurant nearby.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Vườn
review.comment_positive: Het hotel ziet er mooi uit, staff was erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam! Ontbijt was lekker niet super uitgebreid . Het hotel is 5/ 10 minuten lopen van het strand vandaan. Leuke koivijver in het midden van het hotel.
review.comment_negative: Er was bij een restaurant/ bar een karaoke avond dit gaf behoorlijk wat geluidsoverlast, na dit aan te hebben bij het nacht personeel kwamen ze met een goede oplossing dat wij in een andere kamer op de 5de verdieping mochten slapen onze spullen konden we in de andere kamer laten staan. Dit was erg fijn ! Bedankt hiervoor dit heeft onze nachtrust gered.

review.rating: they could include more vegetarian options in the breakfast. the staff was superb very helpful and prompt.
review.room_type: Căn Hộ Nhìn Ra Hồ Bơi

review.comment_positive: This is a great place to stay. Cool space, very quiet.  the room was very clean and fragrant. I am very impressed and appreciate the service of the staff here.  I checked out late, you still understand and do not charge any additional service fees.  Staff is very enthusiastic and polite.  I recommend this place to everyone when they want to come to Danang to relax.  I will come back here and love this place so much.  Thank you to everyone who loved me during the days of stopping here

-Good Location near beach and city center
-Very Helpful Staffs who always try to assist guests well with a great will
-Nice Interior Design especial the rooms and the cafeteria where guests can chill & relax their eyes and mind against the tough weather of the city
review.comment_negative:
-Quite Immature Breakfast which maintained by very few options maybe only good for boutique place
-Views Across Rooms which destroy the privacy of all the rooms while all windows facing to the other ones 
-AirCon is not cool enough and WC is quite small

review.comment_positive: Eco freindly interior. Nice and professional staffs

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn 2 Giường Đơn Với Ghế Sofa

review.comment_positive: The interior design is awesome and relaxing. The staffs are friendly, helpful and welcoming. I suffered from diarrhea and fever caused by food poisoning after eating at Con Market. The staffs took care of me a lot, they helped to buy medicine, brought me ginger tea and some light snacks after 10pm, kept in touch with me via whatsapp till I got well. I was so lucky and grateful to have their help as I am travelling alone. I will recommend Minh Boutique to my friends if they would like to visit Da Nang.
review.comment_negative: Something can be improved, for example, soundproof (I heard alarms from the room next to mine at 3am), location of sockets (no sockets at bedside)
